  20  /**
  21   * Prepare the MainList object for displaying skins.
  22   *
  23   * @param integer max # of posts on the page
  24   */
  25  function init_MainList( $items_nb_limit )
  26  {
  27      global $MainList, $Blog, $Plugins;
  28      global $preview;
  29      global $disp;
  30      global $postIDlist, $postIDarray;
  31  
  32      // Allow plugins to prepare their own MainList object
  33      if( ! $Plugins->trigger_event_first_true('InitMainList', array( 'MainList' => &$MainList, 'limit' => $items_nb_limit ) ) )
  34      {
  35          $MainList = new ItemList2( $Blog, $Blog->get_timestamp_min(), $Blog->get_timestamp_max(), $items_nb_limit );    // COPY (FUNC)
  36  
  37          if( ! $preview )
  38          {
  39              if( $disp == 'page' || $disp == 'terms' )
  40              {    // Get pages:
  41                  $MainList->set_default_filters( array(
  42                          'types' => '1000',        // pages
  43                      ) );
  44              }
  45  
  46              // else: we are in posts mode
  47  
  48              // pre_dump( $MainList->default_filters );
  49              $MainList->load_from_Request( false );
  50              // pre_dump( $MainList->filters );
  51              // echo '<br/>'.( $MainList->is_filtered() ? 'filtered' : 'NOT filtered' );
  52              // $MainList->dump_active_filters();
  53  
  54              // Run the query:
  55              $MainList->query();
  56  
  57              // Old style globals for category.funcs:
  58              $postIDlist = $MainList->get_page_ID_list();
  59              $postIDarray = $MainList->get_page_ID_array();
  60          }
  61          else
  62          {    // We want to preview a single post, we are going to fake a lot of things...
  63              $MainList->preview_from_request();
  64  
  65              // Legacy for the category display
  66              $cat_array = array();
  67          }
  68      }
  69  
  70      param( 'more', 'integer', 0, true );
  71      param( 'page', 'integer', 1, true ); // Post page to show
  72      param( 'c',    'integer', 0, true ); // Display comments?
  73      param( 'tb',   'integer', 0, true ); // Display trackbacks?
  74      param( 'pb',   'integer', 0, true ); // Display pingbacks?
  75  }

  78  /**
  79   * Prepare the 'In-skin editing'.
  80   *
  81   */
  82  function init_inskin_editing()
  83  {
  84      global $Blog, $edited_Item, $action, $form_action;
  85      global $item_tags, $item_title, $item_content;
  86      global $admin_url, $redirect_to, $advanced_edit_link;
  87  
  88      if( ! $Blog->get_setting( 'in_skin_editing' ) )
  89      {    // Redirect to the Back-office editing (setting is OFF)
  90          header_redirect( $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&action=new&blog='.$Blog->ID );
  91      }
  92  
  93      $tab_switch_params = 'blog='.$Blog->ID;
  94  
  95      // Post ID, go from $_GET when we edit post from Front-office
  96      $post_ID = param( 'p', 'integer', 0 );
  97  
  98      // Post ID, go from $_GET when we copy post from Front-office
  99      $copy_post_ID = param( 'cp', 'integer', 0 );
 100  
 101      if( $post_ID > 0 )
 102      {    // Edit post
 103          global $post_extracats;
 104          $action = 'edit';
 105  
 106          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache ();
 107          $edited_Item = $ItemCache->get_by_ID ( $post_ID );
 108  
 109          check_categories_nosave ( $post_category, $post_extracats );
 110          $post_extracats = postcats_get_byID( $post_ID );
 111  
 112          $redirect_to = url_add_param( $Blog->gen_blogurl(), 'disp=edit&p='.$post_ID, '&' );
 113          $tab_switch_params .= '&amp;p='.$edited_Item->ID;
 114      }
 115      elseif( $copy_post_ID > 0 )
 116      {    // Copy post
 117          global $localtimenow;
 118          $action = 'new';
 119  
 120          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache ();
 121          $edited_Item = $ItemCache->get_by_ID ( $copy_post_ID );
 122  
 123          $edited_Item_Blog = $edited_Item->get_Blog();
 124          $item_status = $edited_Item_Blog->get_allowed_item_status();
 125  
 126          $edited_Item->set( 'status', $item_status );
 127          $edited_Item->set( 'dateset', 0 );    // Date not explicitly set yet
 128          $edited_Item->set( 'issue_date', date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s', $localtimenow ) );
 129  
 130          modules_call_method( 'constructor_item', array( 'Item' => & $edited_Item ) );
 131  
 132          check_categories_nosave( $post_category, $post_extracats );
 133  
 134          $redirect_to = url_add_param( $Blog->gen_blogurl(), 'disp=edit', '&' );
 135      }
 136      elseif( empty( $action ) )
 137      {    // Create new post (from Front-office)
 138          $action = 'new';
 139  
 140          load_class( 'items/model/_item.class.php', 'Item' );
 141          $edited_Item = new Item();
 142          $def_status = get_highest_publish_status( 'post', $Blog->ID, false );
 143          $edited_Item->set( 'status', $def_status );
 144          check_categories_nosave( $post_category, $post_extracats );
 145          $edited_Item->set('main_cat_ID', $Blog->get_default_cat_ID());
 146  
 147          // Set default locations from current user
 148          $edited_Item->set_creator_location( 'country' );
 149          $edited_Item->set_creator_location( 'region' );
 150          $edited_Item->set_creator_location( 'subregion' );
 151          $edited_Item->set_creator_location( 'city' );
 152  
 153          // Set object params:
 154          $edited_Item->load_from_Request( /* editing? */ false, /* creating? */ true );
 155  
 156          $redirect_to = url_add_param( $Blog->gen_blogurl(), 'disp=edit', '&' );
 157      }
 158  
 159      // Used in the edit form:
 160  
 161      // We never allow HTML in titles, so we always encode and decode special chars.
 162      $item_title = htmlspecialchars_decode( $edited_Item->title );
 163  
 164      $item_content = prepare_item_content( $edited_Item->content );
 165  
 166      if( ! $edited_Item->get_type_setting( 'allow_html' ) )
 167      { // HTML is disallowed for this post, content is encoded in DB and we need to decode it for editing:
 168          $item_content = htmlspecialchars_decode( $item_content );
 169      }
 170  
 171      // Format content for editing, if we were not already in editing...
 172      $Plugins_admin = & get_Plugins_admin();
 173      $edited_Item->load_Blog();
 174      $params = array( 'object_type' => 'Item', 'object_Blog' => & $edited_Item->Blog );
 175      $Plugins_admin->unfilter_contents( $item_title /* by ref */, $item_content /* by ref */, $edited_Item->get_renderers_validated(), $params );
 176  
 177      $item_tags = implode( ', ', $edited_Item->get_tags() );
 178  
 179      // Get an url for a link 'Go to advanced edit screen'
 180      $advanced_edit_link = array(
 181              'href'    => $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action='.$action.'&amp;'.$tab_switch_params,
 182              'onclick' => 'return b2edit_reload( document.getElementById(\'item_checkchanges\'), \''.$admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID.'\' );',
 183          );
 184  
 185      $form_action = get_samedomain_htsrv_url().'item_edit.php';
 186  }

 188  /**
 189   * If an Intro Post is available, return it. If not, see if a Featured Post is available and return it.
 190   *
 191   * Note: this will set the global $FeaturedList which may be used to obtain several featured Items.
 192   *
 193   * @param string Name of $disp where we should display it
 194   * @param string Collection IDs:
 195   *                 NULL: depend on blog setting "Collections to aggregate"
 196   *                 empty: current blog only
 197   *                 "*": all blogs
 198   *                 "1,2,3":blog IDs separated by comma
 199   *                 "-": current blog only and exclude the aggregated blogs
 200   * @return Item
 201   */
 202  function & get_featured_Item( $restrict_disp = 'posts', $coll_IDs = NULL )
 203  {
 204      global $Blog, $cat;
 205      global $disp, $disp_detail, $MainList, $FeaturedList;
 206      global $featured_displayed_item_IDs;
 207  
 208      if( $disp != $restrict_disp || !isset($MainList) )
 209      {    // If we're not currently displaying posts, no need to try & display a featured/intro post on top!
 210          $Item = NULL;
 211          return $Item;
 212      }
 213  
 214      if( !isset( $FeaturedList ) )
 215      {    // Don't repeat if we've done this already -- Initialize the featured list only first time this function is called in a skin:
 216  
 217          // Get ready to obtain 1 post only:
 218          $FeaturedList = new ItemList2( $Blog, $Blog->get_timestamp_min(), $Blog->get_timestamp_max(), 1 );
 219  
 220          $featured_list_filters = $MainList->filters;
 221          if( ! empty( $cat ) )
 222          {    // Get a featured post only of the selected category and don't touch the posts of the child categories:
 223              $featured_list_filters['cat_array'] = array( $cat );
 224          }
 225  
 226          // Set default filters for the current page:
 227          $FeaturedList->set_default_filters( $featured_list_filters );
 228  
 229          // FIRST: Try to find an Intro post:
 230  
 231          if( ! $MainList->is_filtered() )
 232          {    // This is not a filtered page, so we are on the home page.
 233              if( $restrict_disp == 'front' )
 234              {    // Special Front page:
 235                  // Use Intro-Front posts
 236                  $restrict_to_types = '1400';
 237              }
 238              else
 239              {    // Default front page displaying posts:
 240                  // The competing intro-* types are: 'main' and 'all':
 241                  // fplanque> IMPORTANT> nobody changes this without consulting the manual and talking to me first!
 242                  $restrict_to_types = '1500,1600';
 243              }
 244          }
 245          else
 246          {    // We are on a filtered... it means a category page or sth like this...
 247              // echo $disp_detail;
 248              switch( $disp_detail )
 249              {
 250                  case 'posts-cat':
 251                  case 'posts-subcat':
 252                      // The competing intro-* types are: 'cat' and 'all':
 253                      // fplanque> IMPORTANT> nobody changes this without consulting the manual and talking to me first!
 254                      $restrict_to_types = '1520,1600';
 255                      break;
 256  
 257                  case 'posts-tag':
 258                      // The competing intro-* types are: 'tag' and 'all':
 259                      // fplanque> IMPORTANT> nobody changes this without consulting the manual and talking to me first!
 260                      $restrict_to_types = '1530,1600';
 261                      break;
 262  
 263                  default:
 264                      // The competing intro-* types are: 'sub' and 'all':
 265                      // fplanque> IMPORTANT> nobody changes this without consulting the manual and talking to me first!
 266                      $restrict_to_types = '1570,1600';
 267              }
 268          }
 269  
 270          $FeaturedList->set_filters( array(
 271                  'coll_IDs' => $coll_IDs,
 272                  'types' => $restrict_to_types,
 273              ), false /* Do NOT memorize!! */ );
 274          // pre_dump( $FeaturedList->filters );
 275          // Run the query:
 276          $FeaturedList->query();
 277  
 278  
 279          // SECOND: If no Intro, try to find an Featured post:
 280  
 281          if( $FeaturedList->result_num_rows == 0 && $restrict_disp != 'front' )
 282          { // No Intro page was found, try to find a featured post instead:
 283  
 284              $FeaturedList->reset();
 285  
 286              $FeaturedList->set_filters( array(
 287                      'coll_IDs' => $coll_IDs,
 288                      'featured' => 1,  // Featured posts only (TODO!)
 289                      // Types will already be reset to defaults here
 290                  ), false /* Do NOT memorize!! */ );
 291  
 292              // Run the query:
 293              $FeaturedList->query();
 294          }
 295      }
 296  
 297      // Get first Item in the result set.
 298      $Item = $FeaturedList->get_item();
 299  
 300      if( $Item )
 301      {    // Memorize that ID so that it can later be filtered out of normal display:
 302          $featured_displayed_item_IDs[] = $Item->ID;
 303      }
 304  
 305      return $Item;
 306  }

 309  /**
 310   * Validate URL title (slug) / Also used for category slugs
 311   *
 312   * Using title as a source if url title is empty.
 313   * We allow up to 200 chars (which is ridiculously long) for WP import compatibility.
 314   * New slugs will be cropped to 5 words so the URLs are not too long.
 315   *
 316   * @param string url title to validate
 317   * @param string real title to use as a source if $urltitle is empty (encoded in $evo_charset)
 318   * @param integer ID of post
 319   * @param boolean Query the DB, but don't modify the URL title if the title already exists (Useful if you only want to alert the pro user without making changes for him)
 320   * @param string The prefix of the database column names (e. g. "post_" for post_urltitle)
 321   * @param string The name of the post ID column
 322   * @param string The name of the DB table to use
 323   * @param NULL|string The post locale or NULL if there is no specific locale.
 324   * @return string validated url title
 325   */
 326  function urltitle_validate( $urltitle, $title, $post_ID = 0, $query_only = false,
 327                                      $dbSlugFieldName = 'post_urltitle', $dbIDname = 'post_ID',
 328                                      $dbtable = 'T_items__item', $post_locale = NULL )
 329  {
 330      global $DB, $Messages;
 331  
 332      $urltitle = trim( $urltitle );
 333      $orig_title = $urltitle;
 334  
 335      if( empty( $urltitle ) )
 336      {
 337          if( ! empty($title) )
 338              $urltitle = $title;
 339          else
 340              $urltitle = 'title';
 341      }
 342  
 343      // echo 'starting with: '.$urltitle.'<br />';
 344  
 345      // Replace special chars/umlauts, if we can convert charsets:
 346      load_funcs('locales/_charset.funcs.php');
 347      $urltitle = replace_special_chars($urltitle, $post_locale);
 348  
 349      // Make everything lowercase and use trim again after replace_special_chars
 350      $urltitle = strtolower( trim ( $urltitle ) );
 351  
 352      if( empty( $urltitle ) )
 353      {
 354          $urltitle = 'title';
 355      }
 356  
 357      // Leave only first 5 words in order to get a shorter URL
 358      // (which is generally accepted as a better practice)
 359      // User can manually enter a very long URL if he wants
 360      $slug_changed = param( 'slug_changed' );
 361      if( $slug_changed == 0 )
 362      { // this should only happen when the slug is auto generated
 363          global $Blog;
 364          if( isset( $Blog ) )
 365          { // Get max length of slug from current blog setting
 366              $count_of_words = $Blog->get_setting('slug_limit');
 367          }
 368          if( empty( $count_of_words ) )
 369          { // Use 5 words to limit slug by default
 370              $count_of_words = 5;
 371          }
 372  
 373          $title_words = array();
 374          $title_words = explode( '-', $urltitle );
 375          if( count($title_words) > $count_of_words )
 376          {
 377              $urltitle = '';
 378              for( $i = 0; $i < $count_of_words; $i++ )
 379              {
 380                  $urltitle .= $title_words[$i].'-';
 381              }
 382              //delete last '-'
 383              $urltitle = substr( $urltitle, 0, strlen($urltitle) - 1 );
 384          }
 385  
 386          // echo 'leaving 5 words: '.$urltitle.'<br />';
 387      }
 388  
 389      // Normalize to 200 chars + a number
 390      preg_match( '/^(.*?)((-|_)+([0-9]+))?$/', $urltitle, $matches );
 391      $urlbase = substr( $matches[1], 0, 200 );
 392      // strip a possible dash at the end of the URL title:
 393      $urlbase = rtrim( $urlbase, '-' );
 394      $urltitle = $urlbase;
 395      if( ! empty( $matches[4] ) )
 396      {
 397          $urltitle .= '-'.$matches[4];
 398      }
 399  
 400      if( !$query_only )
 401      {
 402          // TODO: dh> this might get used to utilize the SlugCache instead of the processing below.
 403          #if( $post_ID && $dbtable == 'T_slug' )
 404          #{
 405          #    $existing_Slug = get_SlugCache()->get_by_name($urltitle, false, false);
 406          #    if( $existing_Slug )
 407          #    {
 408          #        $slug_field_name = preg_replace('~^slug_~', '', $dbIDname);
 409          #        if( $existing_Slug->get($slug_field_name) == $urltitle )
 410          #        {
 411          #            // OK
 412          #        }
 413          #    }
 414          #}
 415          // CHECK FOR UNIQUENESS:
 416          // Find all occurrences of urltitle-number in the DB:
 417          $sql = 'SELECT '.$dbSlugFieldName.', '.$dbIDname.'
 418                            FROM '.$dbtable.'
 419                           WHERE '.$dbSlugFieldName." REGEXP '^".$urlbase."(-[0-9]+)?$'";
 420          $exact_match = false;
 421          $highest_number = 0;
 422          $use_existing_number = NULL;
 423          foreach( $DB->get_results( $sql, ARRAY_A ) as $row )
 424          {
 425              $existing_urltitle = $row[$dbSlugFieldName];
 426              // echo "existing = $existing_urltitle <br />";
 427              if( $existing_urltitle == $urltitle && $row[$dbIDname] != $post_ID )
 428              { // We have an exact match, we'll have to change the number.
 429                  $exact_match = true;
 430              }
 431              if( preg_match( '/-([0-9]+)$/', $existing_urltitle, $matches ) )
 432              { // This one has a number, we extract it:
 433                  $existing_number = (int)$matches[1];
 434  
 435                  if( ! isset($use_existing_number) && $row[$dbIDname] == $post_ID )
 436                  { // if there is a numbered entry for the current ID, use this:
 437                      $use_existing_number = $existing_number;
 438                  }
 439  
 440                  if( $existing_number > $highest_number )
 441                  { // This is the new high
 442                      $highest_number = $existing_number;
 443                  }
 444              }
 445          }
 446          // echo "highest existing number = $highest_number <br />";
 447  
 448          if( $exact_match && !$query_only )
 449          { // We got an exact (existing) match, we need to change the number:
 450              $number = $use_existing_number ? $use_existing_number : ($highest_number+1);
 451              $urltitle = $urlbase.'-'.$number;
 452          }
 453      }
 454  
 455      // echo "using = $urltitle <br />";
 456  
 457      if( !empty($orig_title) && $urltitle != $orig_title )
 458      {
 459          $Messages->add( sprintf(T_('Warning: the URL slug has been changed to &laquo;%s&raquo;.'), $urltitle ), 'note' );
 460      }
 461  
 462      return $urltitle;
 463  }

 466  /**
 467   * if global $postdata was not set it will be
 468   */
 469  function get_postdata($postid)
 470  {
 471      global $DB, $postdata, $show_statuses;
 472  
 473      if( !empty($postdata) && $postdata['ID'] == $postid )
 474      { // We are asking for postdata of current post in memory! (we're in the b2 loop)
 475          // Already in memory! This will be the case when generating permalink at display
 476          // (but not when sending trackbacks!)
 477          // echo "*** Accessing post data in memory! ***<br />\n";
 478          return($postdata);
 479      }
 480  
 481      // echo "*** Loading post data! ***<br>\n";
 482      // We have to load the post
 483      $sql = 'SELECT post_ID, post_creator_user_ID, post_datestart, post_datemodified, post_status, post_content, post_title,
 484                                              post_main_cat_ID, cat_blog_ID ';
 485      $sql .= ', post_locale, post_url, post_wordcount, post_comment_status ';
 486      $sql .= '    FROM T_items__item
 487                       INNER JOIN T_categories ON post_main_cat_ID = cat_ID
 488                       WHERE post_ID = '.$postid;
 489      // Restrict to the statuses we want to show:
 490      // echo $show_statuses;
 491      // fplanque: 2004-04-04: this should not be needed here. (and is indeed problematic when we want to
 492      // get a post before even knowning which blog it belongs to. We can think of putting a security check
 493      // back into the Item class)
 494      // $sql .= ' AND '.statuses_where_clause( $show_statuses );
 495  
 496      // echo $sql;
 497  
 498      if( $myrow = $DB->get_row( $sql ) )
 499      {
 500          $mypostdata = array (
 501              'ID' => $myrow->post_ID,
 502              'Author_ID' => $myrow->post_creator_user_ID,
 503              'Date' => $myrow->post_datestart,
 504              'Status' => $myrow->post_status,
 505              'Content' => $myrow->post_content,
 506              'Title' => $myrow->post_title,
 507              'Category' => $myrow->post_main_cat_ID,
 508              'Locale' => $myrow->post_locale,
 509              'Url' => $myrow->post_url,
 510              'Wordcount' => $myrow->post_wordcount,
 511              'comment_status' => $myrow->post_comment_status,
 512              'Blog' => $myrow->cat_blog_ID,
 513              );
 514  
 515          // Caching is particularly useful when displaying a single post and you call single_post_title several times
 516          if( !isset( $postdata ) ) $postdata = $mypostdata;    // Will save time, next time :)
 517  
 518          return($mypostdata);
 519      }
 520  
 521      return false;
 522  }

 531  /**
 532   * Returns the number of the words in a string, sans HTML
 533   *
 534   * @todo dh> Test if http://de3.php.net/manual/en/function.str-word-count.php#85579 works better/faster
 535   *           (only one preg_* call and no loop).
 536   *
 537   * @param string The string.
 538   * @return integer Number of words.
 539   *
 540   * @internal PHP's str_word_count() is not accurate. Inaccuracy reported
 541   *           by sam2kb: http://forums.b2evolution.net/viewtopic.php?t=16596
 542   */
 543  function bpost_count_words( $str )
 544  {
 545      global $evo_charset;
 546  
 547      $str = trim( strip_tags( $str ) );
 548  
 549      // Note: The \p escape sequence is available since PHP 4.4.0 and 5.1.0.
 550      if( @preg_match( '|\pL|u', 'foo' ) === false )
 551      {
 552          return str_word_count( $str );
 553      }
 554  
 555      $count = 0;
 556  
 557      foreach( preg_split( '#\s+#', convert_charset( $str, 'UTF-8', $evo_charset ), -1,
 558                              PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY ) as $word )
 559      {
 560          if( preg_match( '#\pL#u', $word ) )
 561          {
 562              ++$count;
 563          }
 564      }
 565  
 566      return $count;
 567  }

 570  /**
 571   * Get allowed statuses for the current User
 572   *
 573   * Note: This function must be called only from the statuses_where_clause()!
 574   *
 575   * @param array statuses to filter
 576   * @param string database status field column prefix
 577   * @param integer the blog ID where to check allowed statuses
 578   * @param string the status permission prefix
 579   * @return string the condition
 580   */
 581  function get_allowed_statuses_condition( $statuses, $dbprefix, $req_blog, $perm_prefix )
 582  {
 583      global $current_User;
 584  
 585      // init where clauses array
 586      $where = array();
 587      // init allowed statuses array
 588      $allowed_statuses = array();
 589  
 590      $is_logged_in = is_logged_in( false );
 591      $creator_coll_name = ( $dbprefix == 'post_' ) ? $dbprefix.'creator_user_ID' : $dbprefix.'author_user_ID';
 592      // Iterate through all statuses and set allowed to true only if the corresponding status is allowed in case of any post/comments
 593      // If the status is not allowed to show, but exists further conditions which may allow it, then set the condition.
 594      foreach( $statuses as $key => $status )
 595      {
 596          switch( $status )
 597          {
 598              case 'published': // Published post/comments are always allowed
 599                  $allowed = true;
 600                  break;
 601  
 602              case 'community': // It is always allowed for logged in users
 603                  $allowed = $is_logged_in;
 604                  break;
 605  
 606              case 'protected': // It is always allowed for members
 607                  $allowed = ( $is_logged_in && ( $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_ismember', 1, false, $req_blog ) ) );
 608                  break;
 609  
 610              case 'private': // It is allowed for users who has global 'editall' permission but only on back-office
 611                  $allowed = ( is_admin_page() && $current_User->check_perm( 'blogs', 'editall' ) );
 612                  if( !$allowed && $is_logged_in && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'private', 'create', false, $req_blog ) )
 613                  { // Own private posts/comments are allowed if user can create private posts/comments
 614                      $where[] = ' ( '.$dbprefix."status = 'private' AND ".$creator_coll_name.' = '.$current_User->ID.' ) ';
 615                  }
 616                  break;
 617  
 618              case 'review': // It is allowed for users who have permission to create comments with 'review' status and have at least 'lt' posts/comments edit perm
 619                  $allowed = ( $is_logged_in && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'review', 'moderate', false, $req_blog ) );
 620                  if( !$allowed && $is_logged_in && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'review', 'create', false, $req_blog ) )
 621                  { // Own posts/comments with 'review' status are allowed if user can create posts/comments with 'review' status
 622                      $where[] = ' ( '.$dbprefix."status = 'review' AND ".$creator_coll_name.' = '.$current_User->ID.' ) ';
 623                  }
 624                  break;
 625  
 626              case 'draft': // In back-office it is always allowed for users who may create posts/commetns with 'draft' status
 627                  $allowed = ( is_admin_page() && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'draft', 'create', false, $req_blog ) );
 628                  if( !$allowed && $is_logged_in && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'draft', 'create', false, $req_blog ) )
 629                  { // In front-office only authors may see their own draft posts/comments, but only if the have permission to create draft posts/comments
 630                      $where[] = ' ( '.$dbprefix."status = 'draft' AND ".$creator_coll_name.' = '.$current_User->ID.' ) ';
 631                  }
 632                  break;
 633  
 634              case 'deprecated': // In back-office it is always allowed for users who may create posts/comments with 'deprecated' status
 635                  $allowed = ( is_admin_page() && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'deprecated', 'create', false, $req_blog ) );
 636                  // In front-office it is never allowed
 637                  break;
 638  
 639              case 'redirected': // In back-office it is always allowed for users who may create posts/comments with 'deprecated' status
 640                  $allowed = ( is_admin_page() && $current_User->check_perm( $perm_prefix.'redirected', 'create', false, $req_blog ) );
 641                  // In front-office it is never allowed
 642                  break;
 643  
 644              case 'trash':
 645                  // Currently only users with global editall permissions are allowed to view/delete recycled comments
 646                  $allowed = ( ( $dbprefix == 'comment_' ) && is_admin_page() && $current_User->check_perm( 'blogs', 'editall' ) );
 647                  // In front-office it is never allowed
 648                  break;
 649  
 650              default: // Allow other statuses are restricted. It is very important to keep this restricted because of SQL injections also, so we never allow a status what we don't know.
 651                  $allowed = false;
 652          }
 653  
 654          if( $allowed )
 655          { // All posts/comments with this status can be displayed in the request blog for the current User ( or for anonymous )
 656              $allowed_statuses[] = $status;
 657          }
 658      }
 659  
 660      if( count( $allowed_statuses ) )
 661      { // add allowed statuses condition
 662          $where[] = $dbprefix.'status IN ( \''.implode( '\',\'', $allowed_statuses ).'\' )';
 663      }
 664  
 665      // Implode conditions collected in the $where array
 666      // NOTE: If the array is empty, it means that the user has no permission to the requested statuses, so FALSE must be returned
 667      $where_condition = count( $where ) > 0 ? ' ( '.implode( ' OR ', $where ).' ) ' : ' FALSE ';
 668      return $where_condition;
 669  }
 670  
 671  
 672  /**
 673   * Construct the where clause to limit retrieved posts/comment on their status
 674   *
 675   * TODO: asimo> would be good to move this function to an items and comments common file
 676   *
 677   * @param Array statuses of posts/comments we want to get
 678   * @param string post/comment table db prefix
 679   * @param integer blog ID
 680   * @param string permission prefix: 'blog_post!' or 'blog_comment!'
 681   * @param boolean filter statuses by the current user perm and current page, by default is true. It should be false only e.g. when we have to count comments awaiting moderation.
 682   * @return string statuses where condition
 683   */
 684  function statuses_where_clause( $show_statuses = NULL, $dbprefix = 'post_', $req_blog = NULL, $perm_prefix = 'blog_post!', $filter_by_perm = true, $author_filter = NULL )
 685  {
 686      global $current_User, $blog, $DB;
 687  
 688      // This statuses where clause is required for a post query
 689      $is_post_query = ( $perm_prefix == 'blog_post!' );
 690  
 691      if( is_null( $req_blog ) )
 692      { // try to init request blog if it was not set
 693          global $blog;
 694          $req_blog = $blog;
 695      }
 696  
 697      if( empty( $show_statuses ) )
 698      { // use in-skin statuses if show_statuses is empty
 699          $show_statuses = get_inskin_statuses( $req_blog, $is_post_query ? 'post' : 'comment' );
 700      }
 701  
 702      // init where clauses array
 703      $where = array();
 704  
 705      // Check modules item statuses where condition but only in case of the items, and don't need to check in case of comments
 706      if( $req_blog && $is_post_query )
 707      { // If requested blog is set, then set additional "where" clauses from modules method, before we would manipulate the $show_statuses array
 708          $modules_condition = modules_call_method( 'get_item_statuses_where_clause', array( 'blog_ID' => $req_blog, 'statuses' => $show_statuses ) );
 709          if( !empty( $modules_condition ) )
 710          {
 711              foreach( $modules_condition as $condition )
 712              {
 713                  if( ! empty( $condition ) )
 714                  { // condition is not empty
 715                      $where[] = $condition;
 716                  }
 717              }
 718          }
 719      }
 720  
 721      if( is_logged_in( false ) && $filter_by_perm )
 722      { // User is logged in and the account was activated
 723          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'blogs', 'editall', false ) )
 724          { // User has permission to all blogs posts and comments, we don't have to check blog specific permissions.
 725              $allowed_statuses_cond = get_allowed_statuses_condition( $show_statuses, $dbprefix, NULL, $perm_prefix );
 726              if( ! empty( $allowed_statuses_cond ) )
 727              { // condition is not empty
 728                  $where[] = $allowed_statuses_cond;
 729              }
 730              $filter_by_perm = false;
 731              $show_statuses = NULL;
 732          }
 733          elseif( !empty( $author_filter ) && ( $author_filter != $current_User->ID ) )
 734          { // Author filter is set, but current_User is not the filtered user, then these statuses are not visible for sure
 735              $show_statuses = array_diff( $show_statuses, array( 'private', 'draft' ) );
 736          }
 737      }
 738  
 739      if( ( $req_blog == 0 ) && $filter_by_perm )
 740      { // This is a very special case when we must check visibility statuses from each blog separately
 741          // Note: This case should not be called frequently, it may be really slow!!
 742          $where_condition = '';
 743          $condition = '';
 744          if( in_array( 'published', $show_statuses ) )
 745          { // 'published' status is always allowed in case of all blogs, handle this condition separately
 746              $where_condition = '( '.$dbprefix.'status = "published" )';
 747              $condition = ' OR ';
 748          }
 749          if( !is_logged_in( false ) )
 750          { // When user is not logged in only the 'published' status is allowed, don't check more
 751              return $where_condition;
 752          }
 753          if( in_array( 'community', $show_statuses ) )
 754          { // 'community' status is always allowed in case of all blogs when a user is logged in, handle this condition separately
 755              $where_condition .= $condition.'( '.$dbprefix.'status = "community" )';
 756              $condition = ' OR ';
 757          }
 758          // Remove 'published' and 'community' statuses because those were already handled
 759          $show_statuses = array_diff( $show_statuses, array( 'published', 'community' ) );
 760          if( empty( $show_statuses ) )
 761          { // return if there are no other status
 762              return $where_condition;
 763          }
 764          // Select each blog
 765          $blog_ids = $DB->get_col( 'SELECT blog_ID FROM T_blogs' );
 766          $sub_condition = '';
 767          foreach( $blog_ids as $blog_id )
 768          { // create statuses where clause condition for each blog separately
 769              $status_perm = statuses_where_clause( $show_statuses, $dbprefix, $blog_id, $perm_prefix, $filter_by_perm, $author_filter );
 770              if( $status_perm )
 771              { // User has permission to view some statuses on this blog
 772                  $sub_condition .= '( ( cat_blog_ID = '.$blog_id.' ) AND'.$status_perm.' ) OR ';
 773              }
 774          }
 775          if( $dbprefix == 'post_' )
 776          { // Item query condition
 777              $from_table = 'FROM T_items__item';
 778              $reference_column = 'post_ID';
 779          }
 780          else
 781          { // Comment query condition
 782              $from_table = 'FROM T_comments';
 783              $reference_column ='comment_item_ID';
 784          }
 785          // Select each object ID which corresponds to the statuses condition.
 786          // Note: This is a very slow query when there is many post/comments. This case should not be used frequently.
 787          $sub_query = 'SELECT '.$dbprefix.'ID '.$from_table.'
 788                          INNER JOIN T_postcats ON '.$reference_column.' = postcat_post_ID
 789                          INNER JOIN T_categories ON postcat_cat_ID = cat_ID
 790                          WHERE ('.substr( $sub_condition, 0, ( strlen( $sub_condition ) - 3 ) ).')';
 791          $object_ids = implode( ',', $DB->get_col( $sub_query ) );
 792          if( $object_ids )
 793          { // If thre is at least one post or comment
 794              $where_condition .= $condition.'( '.$dbprefix.'ID IN ('.$object_ids.') )';
 795          }
 796          return $where_condition;
 797      }
 798  
 799      if( $filter_by_perm )
 800      { // filter allowed statuses by the current User perms and by the current page ( front or back office )
 801          $allowed_statuses_cond = get_allowed_statuses_condition( $show_statuses, $dbprefix, $req_blog, $perm_prefix );
 802          if( ! empty( $allowed_statuses_cond ) )
 803          { // condition is not empty
 804              $where[] = $allowed_statuses_cond;
 805          }
 806      }
 807      elseif( count( $show_statuses ) )
 808      { // we are not filtering so all status are allowed, add allowed statuses condition
 809          $where[] = $dbprefix.'status IN ( \''.implode( '\',\'', $show_statuses ).'\' )';
 810      }
 811  
 812      $where = count( $where ) > 0 ? ' ( '.implode( ' OR ', $where ).' ) ' : '';
 813  
 814      // echo $where;
 815      return $where;
 816  }
 817  
 818  
 819  /**
 820   * Get post category setting
 821   *
 822   * @param int blog id
 823   * @return int setting value
 824   */
 825  function get_post_cat_setting( $blog )
 826  {
 827      $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
 828      $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog, false, false );
 829      if( ! $Blog )
 830      {
 831          return -1;
 832      }
 833      $post_categories = $Blog->get_setting( 'post_categories' );
 834      switch( $post_categories )
 835      {
 836          case 'no_cat_post':
 837              return 0;
 838          case 'one_cat_post':
 839              return 1;
 840          case 'multiple_cat_post':
 841              return 2;
 842          case 'main_extra_cat_post':
 843              return 3;
 844      }
 845  }

 847  
 848  /**
 849   * Recreate posts autogenerated excerpts
 850   * Only those posts excerpt will be recreated which are visible in the front office
 851   *
 852   * Note: This process can be very very slow if there are many items in the database
 853   *
 854   * @param string the url to call if the process needs to be paused becuase of the max execution time
 855   * @param boolean set true to start from the beginning, false otherwise
 856   * @param boolean set to true to display recreated/all information or leave it on false to display only dots
 857   */
 858  function recreate_autogenerated_excerpts( $continue_url, $remove_all = true, $detailed_progress_log = false )
 859  {
 860      global $DB, $localtimenow;
 861  
 862      $start_time = time();
 863      $max_exec_time = ini_get( 'max_execution_time' );
 864      $load_limit = 50;
 865      $progress_log_id = 'progress_log';
 866      // The timestamp when the process was started
 867      $process_start_ts = param( 'start_ts', 'string', $localtimenow );
 868  
 869      // Update only those posts which may be visible in the front office
 870      $where_condition = '( post_excerpt_autogenerated = 1 OR post_excerpt_autogenerated IS NULL ) AND post_status IN ( \''.implode( '\',\' ', get_inskin_statuses( NULL, 'post' ) ).'\' )';
 871      // Update only those posts which were already created when the recreate process was started
 872      $where_condition .= ' AND post_datecreated < '.$DB->quote( date2mysql( $process_start_ts ) );
 873  
 874      if( $remove_all )
 875      { // We are in the beginning of the process and first we set all autogenerated excerpts values to NULL
 876          if( $detailed_progress_log )
 877          { // Display detailed progess information
 878              echo '<span id="'.$progress_log_id.'">'.T_('Clearing autogenerated excerpt values').'</span>';
 879              evo_flush();
 880          }
 881  
 882          // Set all autogenerated excerpt values to NULL
 883          $query = 'UPDATE T_items__item SET post_excerpt = NULL WHERE '.$where_condition;
 884          $DB->query( $query, 'Remove all autogenerated excerpts' );
 885  
 886          // Count all autogenerated excerpt which value is NULL ( Note: Maybe some of them was already NULL before we have started this process )
 887          $all_excerpt = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT count(*) FROM T_items__item WHERE post_excerpt IS NULL AND '.$where_condition );
 888          $recreated_excerpts = 0;
 889      }
 890      else
 891      { // Init params with a previously started process status
 892          echo '<span id="progress_log"></span>';
 893          $all_excerpt = param( 'all_excerpt', 'integer', 0 );
 894          $recreated_excerpts = param( 'recreated_excerpts', 'integer', 0 );
 895      }
 896  
 897      // Display the current state of the process or a '.' character to indicate the ongoing process
 898      if( $detailed_progress_log )
 899      {
 900          echo_progress_log_update( $progress_log_id, $recreated_excerpts, $all_excerpt );
 901      }
 902      else
 903      {
 904          echo ' .';
 905      }
 906      evo_flush();
 907  
 908      $load_SQL = new SQL();
 909      $load_SQL->SELECT( '*' );
 910      $load_SQL->FROM( 'T_items__item' );
 911      $load_SQL->WHERE( $where_condition.' AND post_excerpt IS NULL' );
 912      $load_SQL->LIMIT( $load_limit );
 913  
 914      $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
 915      while( count( $ItemCache->load_by_sql( $load_SQL ) ) > 0 )
 916      { // New portion of items was loaded
 917          $processed_items = 0;
 918          while( ( $iterator_Item = & $ItemCache->get_next() ) != NULL )
 919          { // Create new autogenerated excerpt and save it in the database
 920              $excerpt = $iterator_Item->get_autogenerated_excerpt();
 921              // Update excerpt without Item->dbupdate() call to make it faster
 922              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item SET post_excerpt = '.$DB->quote( $excerpt ).' WHERE post_ID = '.$DB->quote( $iterator_Item->ID ) );
 923              $processed_items++;
 924              if( $detailed_progress_log && ( ( $processed_items % 3 ) == 0 ) )
 925              { // Update progress info after every 3 recreated excerpt when detailed progress log was requested
 926                  echo_progress_log_update( $progress_log_id, $recreated_excerpts + $processed_items, $all_excerpt );
 927                  evo_flush();
 928              }
 929          }
 930  
 931          // Increase the number recreated excerpts
 932          $recreated_excerpts += $processed_items;
 933  
 934          // Clear already process items from the cache
 935          $ItemCache->clear();
 936          // Display progress log
 937          if( $detailed_progress_log )
 938          {
 939              echo_progress_log_update( $progress_log_id, $recreated_excerpts, $all_excerpt );
 940          }
 941          else
 942          {
 943              echo ' .';
 944          }
 945          evo_flush();
 946  
 947          if( ( $max_exec_time != 0 ) && ( $recreated_excerpts < $all_excerpt ) )
 948          { // a max execution time limit is set and there are more excerpts to create
 949              $elapsed_time = time() - $start_time;
 950              if( $elapsed_time > ( $max_exec_time - 10 ) )
 951              { // Increase the time limit in case if less than 10 seconds remained
 952                  $max_exec_time = $max_exec_time + 100;
 953                  if( ! set_max_execution_time( $max_exec_time ) )
 954                  {
 955                      $continue_url = url_add_param( $continue_url, 'all_excerpt='.$all_excerpt.'&amp;recreated_excerpts='.$recreated_excerpts.'&amp;start_ts='.$process_start_ts, '&amp;' );
 956                      echo '<br />'.'We are reaching the time limit for this script. Please click <a href="'.$continue_url.'">continue</a>...';
 957                      evo_flush();
 958                      exit(0);
 959                  }
 960              }
 961          }
 962      }
 963  
 964      // Check if the recreated exceprts number match with the total number of autogenerated excerpts
 965      if( $detailed_progress_log && ( $recreated_excerpts < $all_excerpt ) )
 966      { // This means that we are in the end of the process but some post excerpt was updated outside of this process
 967          // Here we increase the recreated excerpts value because all excerpts were recreated, however some of them not during this process
 968          echo_progress_log_update( $progress_log_id, $all_excerpt, $all_excerpt );
 969          if( $all_excerpt == ( $recreated_excerpts + 1 ) )
 970          {
 971              echo '<br />'.T_('Note: One excerpt was re-created in another simultaneous process!');
 972          }
 973          else
 974          {
 975              echo '<br />'.sprintf( T_('Note: %d excerpts were re-created in another simultaneous process!'), $all_excerpt - $recreated_excerpts );
 976          }
 977      }
 978  }

 981  /**
 982   * Allow recursive category selection.
 983   *
 984   * @todo Allow to use a dropdown (select) to switch between blogs ( CSS / JS onchange - no submit.. )
 985   *
 986   * @param Form
 987   * @param boolean true: use form fields, false: display only
 988   * @param boolean true: show links for add new category & manual
 989   * @param array Params
 990   */
 991  function cat_select( $Form, $form_fields = true, $show_title_links = true, $params = array() )
 992  {
 993      global $blog, $current_blog_ID, $current_User, $edited_Item, $cat_select_form_fields;
 994      global $admin_url, $rsc_url;
 995  
 996      if( get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) < 1 )
 997      { // No categories for $blog
 998          return;
 999      }
1000  
1001      $params = array_merge( array(
1002              'categories_name' => T_('Categories'),
1003              'fold'            => false,
1004          ), $params );
1005  
1006      $cat = param( 'cat', 'integer', 0 );
1007      if( empty( $edited_Item->ID ) && !empty( $cat ) )
1008      {    // If the GET param 'cat' is defined we should preselect the category for new created post
1009          global $post_extracats;
1010          $post_extracats = array( $cat );
1011          $edited_Item->main_cat_ID = $cat;
1012      }
1013  
1014      if( $show_title_links )
1015      { // Use in Back-office
1016          $fieldset_title = $params['categories_name'].get_manual_link( 'post-categories-panel' )
1017              .action_icon( T_('Categories'), 'edit', $admin_url.'?ctrl=chapters&amp;blog='.$blog, T_('Categories'), 3, 4, array( 'class' => 'action_icon pull-right' ) );
1018      }
1019      else
1020      {
1021          $fieldset_title = $params['categories_name'];
1022      }
1023  
1024      $Form->begin_fieldset( $fieldset_title, array( 'class'=>'extracats', 'id' => 'itemform_categories', 'fold' => $params['fold'] ) );
1025  
1026      $r ='';
1027      $cat_select_form_fields = $form_fields;
1028      $ChapterCache = & get_ChapterCache();
1029  
1030      $r .= '<table cellspacing="0" class="catselect table table-striped table-hover table-condensed">';
1031      if( get_post_cat_setting($blog) == 3 )
1032      { // Main + Extra cats option is set, display header
1033          $r .= cat_select_header( $params );
1034      }
1035  
1036      $callbacks = array(
1037          'before_first' => 'cat_select_before_first',
1038          'before_each'  => 'cat_select_before_each',
1039          'after_each'   => 'cat_select_after_each',
1040          'after_last'   => 'cat_select_after_last'
1041      );
1042  
1043      // Init cat display param
1044      $cat_display_params = array( 'total_count' => 0 );
1045  
1046      if( get_allow_cross_posting() >= 2 ||
1047        ( isset( $blog) && get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) > 1 && get_allow_cross_posting() == 1 ) )
1048      { // If BLOG cross posting enabled, go through all blogs with cats:
1049          /**
1050           * @var BlogCache
1051           */
1052          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
1053          $ChapterCache->reveal_children( NULL, true );
1054  
1055          /**
1056           * @var Blog
1057           */
1058          for( $l_Blog = & $BlogCache->get_first(); !is_null($l_Blog); $l_Blog = & $BlogCache->get_next() )
1059          { // run recursively through the cats
1060              if( ! blog_has_cats( $l_Blog->ID ) )
1061                  continue;
1062  
1063              if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_post_statuses', 'edit', false, $l_Blog->ID ) )
1064                  continue;
1065  
1066              $r .= '<tr class="group'.( $blog == $l_Blog->ID ? ' catselect_blog__current' : '' ).'" id="catselect_blog'.$l_Blog->ID.'"><td colspan="3">'.$l_Blog->dget('name')."</td></tr>\n";
1067  
1068              $current_blog_ID = $l_Blog->ID;    // Global needed in callbacks
1069              foreach( $ChapterCache->subset_root_cats[$current_blog_ID] as $root_Chapter )
1070              {
1071                  $r .= cat_select_display( $root_Chapter, $callbacks, $cat_display_params );
1072              }
1073              if( $blog == $current_blog_ID )
1074              {
1075                  $r .= cat_select_new( $cat_display_params );
1076              }
1077          }
1078      }
1079      else
1080      { // BLOG Cross posting is disabled. Current blog only:
1081          $current_blog_ID = $blog;
1082          $ChapterCache->reveal_children( $current_blog_ID, true );
1083  
1084          foreach( $ChapterCache->subset_root_cats[$blog] as $root_Chapter )
1085          {
1086              $r .= cat_select_display( $root_Chapter, $callbacks, $cat_display_params );
1087          }
1088  
1089          $r .= cat_select_new( $cat_display_params );
1090      }
1091  
1092      $r .= '</table>';
1093  
1094      echo $r;
1095  
1096      $Form->end_fieldset();
1097  
1098      if( isset($blog) && get_allow_cross_posting() )
1099      {
1100          echo '<script type="text/javascript">jQuery.getScript("'.get_require_url( '#scrollto#' ).'", function () {
1101              jQuery("[id$=itemform_categories]").scrollTo( "#catselect_blog'.$blog.'" );
1102          });</script>';
1103      }
1104  }

1133  /**
1134   * Get content of a category display recursively with all of its subcats in a cat selection control
1135   *
1136   * @param object Chapter
1137   * @param array callbacks to display a line of category
1138   * @param array display params
1139   * @return string content to display
1140   */
1141  function cat_select_display( $Chapter, $callbacks, & $params = array() )
1142  {
1143      $params = array_merge( array(
1144              'level'  => 1,
1145              'sorted' => true,
1146              'total_count' => 0,
1147          ), $params );
1148  
1149      $callbacks = array_merge( array(
1150              'before_first' => NULL,
1151              'before_each'  => NULL,
1152              'after_each'   => NULL,
1153              'after_last'   => NULL
1154          ), $callbacks );
1155  
1156      $params['total_count'] = $params['total_count'] + 1;
1157      $parent_Chapter = & $Chapter->get_parent_Chapter();
1158  
1159      $r = '';
1160  
1161      if( is_array( $callbacks['before_each'] ) )
1162      { // object callback:
1163          $r .= $callbacks['before_each'][0]->{$callbacks['before_each'][1]}( $Chapter->ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'] );
1164      }
1165      else
1166      {
1167          $r .= $callbacks['before_each']( $Chapter->ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'] );
1168      }
1169  
1170      if( is_array( $callbacks['after_each'] ) )
1171      { // object callback:
1172          $r .= $callbacks['after_each'][0]->{$callbacks['after_each'][1]}( $Chapter->ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'] );
1173      }
1174      else
1175      {
1176          $r .= $callbacks['after_each']( $Chapter->ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'] );
1177      }
1178  
1179      if( empty( $Chapter->children ) )
1180      {
1181          return $r;
1182      }
1183  
1184      if( $params['sorted'] )
1185      {
1186          $Chapter->sort_children();
1187      }
1188  
1189      if( is_array( $callbacks['before_first'] ) )
1190      { // object callback:
1191          $r .= $callbacks['before_first'][0]->{$callbacks['before_first'][1]}( $Chapter->parent_ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'], 1 );
1192      }
1193      else
1194      {
1195          $r .= $callbacks['before_first']( $Chapter->parent_ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'], 1 );
1196      }
1197  
1198      $params['level'] = $params['level'] + 1;
1199      foreach( $Chapter->children as $child_Chapter )
1200      {
1201          $r .= cat_select_display( $child_Chapter, $callbacks, $params );
1202      }
1203      $params['level'] = $params['level'] - 1;
1204  
1205      if( is_array( $callbacks['after_last'] ) )
1206      { // object callback:
1207          $r .= $callbacks['after_last'][0]->{$callbacks['after_last'][1]}( $Chapter->parent_ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'], 1 );
1208      }
1209      else
1210      {
1211          $r .= $callbacks['after_last']( $Chapter->parent_ID, $params['level'], $params['total_count'], 1 );
1212      }
1213  
1214      return $r;
1215  }

1226  /**
1227   * callback to display sublist element
1228   */
1229  function cat_select_before_each( $cat_ID, $level, $total_count )
1230  { // callback to display sublist element
1231      global $current_blog_ID, $blog, $post_extracats, $edited_Item, $current_User;
1232      global $creating, $cat_select_level, $cat_select_form_fields;
1233  
1234      $ChapterCache = & get_ChapterCache();
1235      $thisChapter = $ChapterCache->get_by_ID($cat_ID);
1236  
1237      if( $thisChapter->lock && !$current_User->check_perm( 'blog_cats', '', false, $current_blog_ID ) )
1238      {    // This chapter is locked and current user has no permission to edit the categories of this blog
1239          return;
1240      }
1241  
1242      $r = "\n".'<tr class="'.( $total_count%2 ? 'odd' : 'even' ).'">';
1243  
1244      // RADIO for main cat:
1245      if( get_post_cat_setting($blog) != 2 )
1246      { // if no "Multiple categories per post" option is set display radio
1247          if( !$thisChapter->meta
1248              && ( ($current_blog_ID == $blog) || (get_allow_cross_posting( $blog ) >= 2) ) )
1249          { // This is current blog or we allow moving posts accross blogs
1250              if( $cat_select_form_fields )
1251              {    // We want a form field:
1252                  $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_main"><input type="radio" name="post_category" class="checkbox" title="'
1253                              .T_('Select as MAIN category').'" value="'.$cat_ID.'"';
1254                  if( $cat_ID == $edited_Item->main_cat_ID )
1255                  { // main cat of the Item or set as default main cat above
1256                      $r .= ' checked="checked"';
1257                  }
1258                  $r .= ' id="sel_maincat_'.$cat_ID.'"';
1259                  $r .= ' onclick="check_extracat(this);" /></td>';
1260              }
1261              else
1262              {    // We just want info:
1263                  $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_main">'.bullet( $cat_ID == $edited_Item->main_cat_ID ).'</td>';
1264              }
1265          }
1266          else
1267          { // Don't allow to select this cat as a main cat
1268              $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_main">&nbsp;</td>';
1269          }
1270      }
1271  
1272      // CHECKBOX:
1273      if( get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) >= 2 )
1274      { // We allow multiple categories or main + extra cat,  display checkbox:
1275          if( !$thisChapter->meta
1276              && ( ($current_blog_ID == $blog) || ( get_allow_cross_posting( $blog ) % 2 == 1 )
1277                  || ( ( get_allow_cross_posting( $blog ) == 2 ) && ( get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) == 2 ) ) ) )
1278          { // This is the current blog or we allow cross posting (select extra cat from another blog)
1279              if( $cat_select_form_fields )
1280              {    // We want a form field:
1281                  $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_extra"><input type="checkbox" name="post_extracats[]" class="checkbox" title="'
1282                              .T_('Select as an additional category').'" value="'.$cat_ID.'"';
1283                  // if( ($cat_ID == $edited_Item->main_cat_ID) || (in_array( $cat_ID, $post_extracats )) )  <--- We don't want to precheck the default cat because it will stay checked if we change the default main. On edit, the checkbox will always be in the array.
1284                  if( in_array( $cat_ID, $post_extracats ) )
1285                  { // This category was selected
1286                      $r .= ' checked="checked"';
1287                  }
1288                  $r .= ' id="sel_extracat_'.$cat_ID.'"';
1289                  $r .= ' /></td>';
1290              }
1291              else
1292              {    // We just want info:
1293                  $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_main">'.bullet( ($cat_ID == $edited_Item->main_cat_ID) || (in_array( $cat_ID, $post_extracats )) ).'</td>';
1294              }
1295          }
1296          else
1297          { // Don't allow to select this cat as an extra cat
1298              $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_main">&nbsp;</td>';
1299          }
1300      }
1301  
1302      $additional_style = '';
1303  
1304      if( $thisChapter->meta )
1305      {    // Change style of meta category
1306          $additional_style .= 'font-weight:bold;';
1307      }
1308  
1309      $chapter_lock_status = '';
1310      if( $thisChapter->lock )
1311      {    // Add icon for locked category
1312          $chapter_lock_status = '<span style="padding-left:5px">'.get_icon( 'file_not_allowed', 'imgtag', array( 'title' => T_('Locked')) ).'</span>';
1313      }
1314  
1315      $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
1316      $r .= '<td class="catsel_name"><label'
1317                  .' for="'.( get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) == 2
1318                      ? 'sel_extracat_'.$cat_ID
1319                      : 'sel_maincat_'.$cat_ID ).'"'
1320                  .' style="padding-left:'.($level-1).'em;'.$additional_style.'">'
1321                  .$thisChapter->name.'</label>'
1322                  .$chapter_lock_status
1323                  .' <a href="'.htmlspecialchars($thisChapter->get_permanent_url()).'" title="'.htmlspecialchars(T_('View category in blog.')).'">'
1324                  .'&nbsp;&raquo;&nbsp;' // TODO: dh> provide an icon instead? // fp> maybe the A(dmin)/B(log) icon from the toolbar? And also use it for permalinks to posts?
1325                  .'</a></td>'
1326              .'</tr>'."\n";
1327  
1328      return $r;
1329  }

1347  /**
1348   * new category line for catselect table
1349   *
1350   * @param array category display params, contains e.g. the total displayed rows
1351   * @return string new row code
1352   */
1353  function cat_select_new( & $cat_display_params )
1354  {
1355      global $blog, $current_User;
1356  
1357      if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_cats', '', false, $blog ) )
1358      {    // Current user cannot add/edit a categories for this blog
1359          return '';
1360      }
1361  
1362      $new_maincat = param( 'new_maincat', 'boolean', false );
1363      $new_extracat = param( 'new_extracat', 'boolean', false );
1364      if( $new_maincat || $new_extracat )
1365      {
1366          $category_name = param( 'category_name', 'string', '' );
1367      }
1368      else
1369      {
1370          $category_name = '';
1371      }
1372  
1373      $cat_display_params['total_count'] = $cat_display_params['total_count']  + 1;
1374      $r = "\n".'<tr class="'.( $cat_display_params['total_count'] % 2 ? 'odd' : 'even' ).'">';
1375  
1376      if( get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) != 2 )
1377      {
1378          // RADIO for new main cat:
1379          $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_main"><input type="radio" name="post_category" class="checkbox" title="'
1380                              .T_('Select as MAIN category').'" value="0"';
1381          if( $new_maincat )
1382          {
1383              $r.= ' checked="checked"';
1384          }
1385          $r .= ' id="sel_maincat_new"';
1386          $r .= ' onclick="check_extracat(this);"';
1387          $r .= '/></td>';
1388      }
1389  
1390      if( get_post_cat_setting( $blog ) >= 2 )
1391      {
1392          // CHECKBOX
1393          $r .= '<td class="selector catsel_extra"><input type="checkbox" name="post_extracats[]" class="checkbox" title="'
1394                              .T_('Select as an additional category').'" value="0"';
1395          if( $new_extracat )
1396          {
1397              $r.= ' checked="checked"';
1398          }
1399          $r .= 'id="sel_extracat_new"/></td>';
1400      }
1401  
1402      // INPUT TEXT for new category name
1403      $r .= '<td class="catsel_name">'
1404                  .'<input maxlength="255" style="width: 100%;" value="'.$category_name.'" size="20" type="text" name="category_name" id="new_category_name" />'
1405                  .'</td>'
1406              .'</tr>';
1407  
1408      return $r;
1409  }

1412  /**
1413   * Used by the items & the comments controllers
1414   *
1415   * @param boolean TRUE - to display third level tabs, FALSE - to hide them(used in the edit mode)
1416   */
1417  function attach_browse_tabs( $display_tabs3 = true )
1418  {
1419      global $AdminUI, $Blog, $current_User, $admin_url, $ItemTypeCache;
1420  
1421      if( empty( $Blog ) )
1422      { // No blog
1423          return;
1424      }
1425  
1426      $menu_entries = array(
1427          'full' => array(
1428              'text' => T_('All'),
1429              'href' => $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;tab=full&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID,
1430          )
1431      );
1432  
1433      if( $Blog->get_setting( 'use_workflow' ) )
1434      { // We want to use workflow properties for this blog:
1435          $menu_entries['tracker'] = array(
1436              'text' => T_('Workflow view'),
1437              'href' => $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;tab=tracker&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID,
1438          );
1439      }
1440  
1441      if( $Blog->get( 'type' ) == 'manual' )
1442      { // Display this tab only for manual blogs
1443          $menu_entries['manual'] = array(
1444              'text' => T_('Manual view'),
1445              'href' => $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;tab=manual&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID,
1446          );
1447      }
1448  
1449      $type_tabs = get_item_type_tabs();
1450      foreach( $type_tabs as $type_tab )
1451      {
1452          $type_tab_key = 'type_'.str_replace( ' ', '_', utf8_strtolower( $type_tab ) );
1453          $menu_entries[ $type_tab_key ] = array(
1454              'text' => T_( $type_tab ),
1455              'href' => $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;tab=type&amp;tab_type='.urlencode( $type_tab ).'&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID,
1456          );
1457      }
1458  
1459      //$AdminUI->clear_menu_entries( 'collections' );
1460      $AdminUI->add_menu_entries( array( 'collections', 'posts' ), $menu_entries );
1461  
1462      /* fp> Custom types should be variations of normal posts by default
1463        I am ok with giving extra tabs to SOME of them but then the
1464          posttype list has to be transformed into a normal CREATE/UPDATE/DELETE (CRUD)
1465          (see the stats>goals CRUD for an example of a clean CRUD)
1466          and each post type must have a checkbox like "use separate tab"
1467          Note: you can also make a select list "group with: posts|pages|etc...|other|own tab"
1468  
1469          $ItemTypeCache = & get_ItemTypeCache();
1470          $default_post_types = array(1,1000,1500,1520,1530,1570,1600,2000,3000,4000,5000);
1471          $items_types = array_values( array_keys( $ItemTypeCache->get_option_array() ) );
1472          // a tab for custom types
1473          if ( array_diff($items_types,$default_post_types) )
1474          {
1475              $AdminUI->add_menu_entries(
1476                      'items',
1477                      array(
1478                          'custom' => array(
1479                              'text' => T_('Custom Types'),
1480                              'href' => $dispatcher.'?ctrl=items&amp;tab=custom&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID,
1481                          ),
1482                      )
1483              );
1484          }
1485      */
1486  
1487      if( $display_tabs3 && $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_comments', 'edit', false, $Blog->ID ) )
1488      { // User has permission to edit published, draft or deprecated comments (at least one kind)
1489          $AdminUI->add_menu_entries( array( 'collections', 'comments' ), array(
1490              'fullview' => array(
1491                  'text' => T_('Full text view'),
1492                  'href' => $admin_url.'?ctrl=comments&amp;tab3=fullview&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID ),
1493              'listview' => array(
1494                  'text' => T_('List view'),
1495                  'href' => $admin_url.'?ctrl=comments&amp;tab3=listview&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID ),
1496              ) );
1497      }
1498  }

1501  /**
1502   * Get back-office tabs from post types
1503   *
1504   * @return array Tabs
1505   */
1506  function get_item_type_tabs()
1507  {
1508      global $DB, $Blog;
1509  
1510      if( empty( $Blog ) )
1511      { // Don't get the item types if Blog is not defined
1512          return array();
1513      }
1514  
1515      $SQL = new SQL();
1516      $SQL->SELECT( 'DISTINCT( ityp_backoffice_tab )' );
1517      $SQL->FROM( 'T_items__type' );
1518      $SQL->FROM_add( 'INNER JOIN T_items__type_coll ON itc_ityp_ID = ityp_ID AND itc_coll_ID = '.$Blog->ID );
1519      $SQL->WHERE( 'ityp_backoffice_tab IS NOT NULL' );
1520      $SQL->ORDER_BY( 'ityp_ID' );
1521  
1522      return $DB->get_col( $SQL->get() );
1523  }
1524  
1525  
1526  /**
1527   * Get post type IDs by tab name
1528   *
1529   * @return string Item IDs separated by comma
1530   */
1531  function get_item_types_by_tab( $tab_name )
1532  {
1533      global $DB;
1534  
1535      if( empty( $tab_name ) )
1536      {
1537          return '';
1538      }
1539  
1540      $SQL = new SQL();
1541      $SQL->SELECT( 'ityp_ID' );
1542      $SQL->FROM( 'T_items__type' );
1543      $SQL->WHERE( 'ityp_backoffice_tab = '.$DB->quote( $tab_name ) );
1544  
1545      return implode( ',', $DB->get_col( $SQL->get() ) );
1546  }

1549  /**
1550   * Allow to select status/visibility
1551   *
1552   * @param object Form
1553   * @param string Status
1554   * @param boolean Mass create
1555   * @param array labels of statuses
1556   */
1557  function visibility_select( & $Form, $post_status, $mass_create = false, $labels = array(), $field_label = '' )
1558  {
1559      $labels = array_merge( get_visibility_statuses('notes-array'), $labels );
1560  
1561      global $current_User, $Blog;
1562  
1563      $mass_create_statuses = array( 'redirected' );
1564  
1565      $sharing_options = array();
1566  
1567      foreach( $labels as $status => $label )
1568      {
1569          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_post!'.$status, 'create', false, $Blog->ID ) &&
1570              ( !in_array( $status, $mass_create_statuses ) || !$mass_create ) )
1571          {
1572              $sharing_options[] = array( $status, $label[0].' <span class="notes">'.$label[1].'</span>' );
1573          }
1574      }
1575  
1576      if( count( $sharing_options ) == 1 )
1577      { // Only one status is available, don't show visibility select
1578          $Form->hidden( 'post_status', $sharing_options[0][0] );
1579          return;
1580      }
1581  
1582      $Form->radio( 'post_status', $post_status, $sharing_options, $field_label, true );
1583  }

1586  /**
1587   * Selection of the issue date
1588   *
1589   * @todo dh> should display erroneous values (e.g. when giving invalid date) as current (form) value, too.
1590   * @param Form
1591   * @param boolean Break line
1592   * @param string Title
1593   */
1594  function issue_date_control( $Form, $break = false, $field_title = '' )
1595  {
1596      global $edited_Item;
1597  
1598      if( $field_title == '' )
1599      {
1600          $field_title = T_('Issue date');
1601      }
1602  
1603      echo $field_title.':<br />';
1604  
1605      echo '<label><input type="radio" name="item_dateset" id="set_issue_date_now" value="0" '
1606                  .( ($edited_Item->dateset == 0) ? 'checked="checked"' : '' )
1607                  .'/><strong>'.T_('Update to NOW').'</strong></label>';
1608  
1609      if( $break )
1610      {
1611          echo '<br />';
1612      }
1613  
1614      echo '<label><input type="radio" name="item_dateset" id="set_issue_date_to" value="1" '
1615                  .( ($edited_Item->dateset == 1) ? 'checked="checked"' : '' )
1616                  .'/><strong>'.T_('Set to').':</strong></label>';
1617      $Form->date( 'item_issue_date', $edited_Item->get('issue_date'), '' );
1618      echo ' '; // allow wrapping!
1619      $Form->time( 'item_issue_time', $edited_Item->get('issue_date'), '', 'hh:mm:ss', '' );
1620      echo ' '; // allow wrapping!
1621  
1622      // Autoselect "change date" is the date is changed.
1623      ?>
1624      <script>
1625      jQuery( function()
1626              {
1627                  jQuery('#item_issue_date, #item_issue_time').change(function()
1628                  {
1629                      jQuery('#set_issue_date_to').attr("checked", "checked")
1630                  })
1631              }
1632          )
1633      </script>
1634      <?php
1635  
1636  }

1639  /**
1640   * Template tag: Link to an item identified by its url title / slug / name
1641   *
1642   * Note: this will query the database. Thus, in most situations it will make more sense
1643   * to use a hardcoded link. This tag can be useful for prototyping location independant
1644   * sites.
1645   */
1646  function item_link_by_urltitle( $params = array() )
1647  {
1648      // Make sure we are not missing any param:
1649      $params = array_merge( array(
1650              'urltitle'    => NULL,  // MUST BE SPECIFIED
1651              'before'      => ' ',
1652              'after'       => ' ',
1653              'text'        => '#',
1654          ), $params );
1655  
1656    /**
1657       * @var ItemCache
1658       */
1659      $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
1660  
1661    /**
1662       * @var Item
1663       */
1664      $Item = & $ItemCache->get_by_urltitle( $params['urltitle'], false );
1665  
1666      if( empty($Item) )
1667      {
1668          return false;
1669      }
1670  
1671      $Item->permanent_link( $params );
1672  }

1674  
1675  /**
1676   * Load new status when the item was published
1677   * If the status is invalid then an error message will be added to messages
1678   *
1679   * @param boolean true if creating new post, false on update
1680   * @return string the publish status or an allowed status if the given status was invalid
1681   */
1682  function load_publish_status( $creating = false )
1683  {
1684      global $Messages;
1685  
1686      $publish_status = param( 'publish_status', 'string', '' );
1687      if( ! in_array( $publish_status, array( 'published', 'community', 'protected', 'private' ) ) )
1688      { // Publish with the given status doesn't exists "published"
1689          if( $creating )
1690          {
1691              $Messages->add( T_( 'The post has been created but not published because it seems like you wanted to publish with an invalid status.'), 'error' );
1692          }
1693          else
1694          {
1695              $Messages->add( T_( 'The post has been updated but not published because it seems like you wanted to publish with an invalid status.'), 'error' );
1696          }
1697          $publish_status = 'draft';
1698      }
1699      return $publish_status;
1700  }

1703  /**
1704   * Display buttons to update a post
1705   *
1706   * @param object Form
1707   * @param boolean Is creating action
1708   * @param object edited Item
1709   * @param boolean Is in-skin editing
1710   * @param boolean TRUE to display a preview button
1711   */
1712  function echo_publish_buttons( $Form, $creating, $edited_Item, $inskin = false, $display_preview = false )
1713  {
1714      global $Blog, $current_User, $UserSettings;
1715      global $next_action, $highest_publish_status; // needs to be passed out for echo_publishnowbutton_js( $action )
1716  
1717      list( $highest_publish_status, $publish_text ) = get_highest_publish_status( 'post', $Blog->ID );
1718      if( ! isset( $edited_Item->status ) )
1719      {
1720          $edited_Item->status = $highest_publish_status;
1721      }
1722  
1723      // ---------- PREVIEW ----------
1724      if( ! $inskin || $display_preview )
1725      {
1726          $url = url_same_protocol( $Blog->get( 'url' ) ); // was dynurl
1727          $Form->button( array( 'button', '', T_('Preview'), 'PreviewButton', 'b2edit_open_preview(this.form, \''.$url.'\');' ) );
1728      }
1729  
1730      // ---------- VISIBILITY ----------
1731      if( ! $inskin )
1732      { // Only for back-office
1733          global $AdminUI;
1734  
1735          echo '<span class="edit_actions_text">'.T_('Visibility').get_manual_link( 'visibility-status' ).': </span>';
1736  
1737          // Get those statuses which are not allowed for the current User to create posts in this blog
1738          $exclude_statuses = array_merge( get_restricted_statuses( $Blog->ID, 'blog_post!', 'create' ), array( 'trash' ) );
1739          // Get allowed visibility statuses
1740          $status_options = get_visibility_statuses( '', $exclude_statuses );
1741  
1742          if( isset( $AdminUI, $AdminUI->skin_name ) && $AdminUI->skin_name == 'bootstrap' )
1743          { // Use dropdown for bootstrap skin
1744              $status_icon_options = get_visibility_statuses( 'icons', $exclude_statuses );
1745              $Form->hidden( 'post_status', $edited_Item->status );
1746              echo '<div class="btn-group dropup post_status_dropdown">';
1747              echo '<button type="button" class="btn btn-status-'.$edited_Item->status.' dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-expanded="false" id="post_status_dropdown">'
1748                              .'<span>'.$status_options[ $edited_Item->status ].'</span>'
1749                          .' <span class="caret"></span></button>';
1750              echo '<ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu" aria-labelledby="post_status_dropdown">';
1751              foreach( $status_options as $status_key => $status_title )
1752              {
1753                  echo '<li rel="'.$status_key.'" role="presentation"><a href="#" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1">'.$status_icon_options[ $status_key ].' <span>'.$status_title.'</span></a></li>';
1754              }
1755              echo '</ul>';
1756              echo '</div>';
1757          }
1758          else
1759          { // Use standard select element for other skins
1760              echo '<select name="post_status">';
1761              foreach( $status_options as $status_key => $status_title )
1762              {
1763                  echo '<option value="'.$status_key.'"'
1764                              .( $edited_Item->status == $status_key ? ' selected="selected"' : '' )
1765                              .' class="btn-status-'.$status_key.'">'
1766                          .$status_title
1767                      .'</option>';
1768              }
1769              echo '</select>';
1770          }
1771      }
1772  
1773      echo '<span class="btn-group">';
1774  
1775      // ---------- SAVE ----------
1776      $next_action = ($creating ? 'create' : 'update');
1777      if( ! $inskin && $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'edit', false, $edited_Item ) )
1778      { // Show Save & Edit only on admin mode
1779          $Form->submit( array( 'actionArray['.$next_action.'_edit]', /* TRANS: This is the value of an input submit button */ T_('Save & edit'), 'SaveEditButton btn-status-'.$edited_Item->status ) );
1780      }
1781  
1782      if( $inskin )
1783      { // Front-office: display a save button with title depending on post status
1784          $button_titles = get_visibility_statuses( 'button-titles' );
1785          $button_title = isset( $button_titles[ $edited_Item->status ] ) ? T_( $button_titles[ $edited_Item->status ] ) : T_('Save Changes!');
1786      }
1787      else
1788      { // Use static button title on back-office
1789          $button_title = T_('Save');
1790      }
1791      $Form->submit( array( 'actionArray['.$next_action.']', $button_title, 'SaveButton btn-status-'.$edited_Item->status ) );
1792  
1793      echo '</span>';
1794  
1795      $Form->hidden( 'publish_status', $highest_publish_status );
1796  
1797      if( $highest_publish_status == 'published' && $UserSettings->get_collection_setting( 'show_quick_publish', $Blog->ID ) )
1798      { // Display this button to make a post published
1799  
1800          // Only allow publishing if in draft mode. Other modes are too special to run the risk of 1 click publication.
1801          $publish_style = ( $edited_Item->status == $highest_publish_status ) ? 'display: none' : 'display: inline';
1802  
1803          $Form->submit( array(
1804              'actionArray['.$next_action.'_publish]',
1805              /* TRANS: This is the value of an input submit button */ T_('Publish!'),
1806              'SaveButton btn-status-published quick-publish',
1807              '',
1808              $publish_style
1809          ) );
1810      }
1811  }

1955              item.parent().parent().removeClass( 'open' ); // hide dropdown menu
