1969  /**
1970   * Output Javascript for tags autocompletion.
1971   * @todo dh> a more facebook like widget would be: http://plugins.jquery.com/project/facelist
1972   *           "ListBuilder" is being planned for jQuery UI: http://wiki.jqueryui.com/ListBuilder
1973   */
1974  function echo_autocomplete_tags()
1975  {
1976  ?>
1977      <script type="text/javascript">
1978  	function init_autocomplete_tags( selector )
1979      {
1980          var tags = jQuery( selector ).val();
1981          var tags_json = new Array();
1982          if( tags.length > 0 )
1983          { // Get tags from <input>
1984              tags = tags.split( ',' );
1985              for( var t in tags )
1986              {
1987                  tags_json.push( { id: tags[t], title: tags[t] } );
1988              }
1989          }
1990  
1991          jQuery( selector ).tokenInput( '<?php echo get_samedomain_htsrv_url().'anon_async.php?action=get_tags' ?>',
1992          {
1993              theme: 'facebook',
1994              queryParam: 'term',
1995              propertyToSearch: 'title',
1996              tokenValue: 'title',
1997              preventDuplicates: true,
1998              prePopulate: tags_json,
1999              hintText: '<?php echo TS_('Type in a tag') ?>',
2000              noResultsText: '<?php echo TS_('No results') ?>',
2001              searchingText: '<?php echo TS_('Searching...') ?>'
2002          } );
2003      }
2004  
2005      jQuery( document ).ready( function()
2006      {
2007          if( jQuery( '#suggest_item_tags' ).is( ':checked' ) )
2008          {
2009              init_autocomplete_tags( '#item_tags' );
2010          }
2011  
2012          jQuery( '#suggest_item_tags' ).click( function()
2013          {
2014              if( jQuery( this ).is( ':checked' ) )
2015              { // Use plugin to suggest tags
2016                  jQuery( '#item_tags' ).hide();
2017                  init_autocomplete_tags( '#item_tags' );
2018              }
2019              else
2020              { // Remove autocomplete tags plugin
2021                  jQuery( '#item_tags' ).show();
2022                  jQuery( '#item_tags' ).parent().find( 'ul.token-input-list-facebook' ).remove();
2023              }
2024          } );
2025          <?php
2026              // Don't submit a form by Enter when user is editing the tags
2027              echo get_prevent_key_enter_js( '#token-input-item_tags' );
2028          ?>
2029      } );
2030      </script>
2031  <?php
2032  }

2035  /**
2036   * Assert that the supplied post type can be used by the current user in
2037   * the post's extra categories' context.
2038   *
2039   * @param integer Item type ID
2040   * @param array The extra cats of the post.
2041   */
2042  function check_perm_posttype( $item_typ_ID, $post_extracats )
2043  {
2044      global $Blog, $current_User;
2045  
2046      $ItemTypeCache = & get_ItemTypeCache();
2047      $ItemType = & $ItemTypeCache->get_by_ID( $item_typ_ID );
2048  
2049      if( ItemType::is_reserved( $ItemType->ID ) )
2050      { // Don't allow to use a reserved post type:
2051          debug_die( 'This post type is reserved and cannot be used. Please choose another one.' );
2052      }
2053  
2054      if( ! $Blog->is_item_type_enabled( $ItemType->ID ) )
2055      { // Don't allow to use a not enabled post type:
2056          debug_die( 'This post type is not enabled. Please choose another one.' );
2057      }
2058  
2059      // Check permission:
2060      $current_User->check_perm( 'cats_item_type_'.$ItemType->perm_level, 'edit', true /* assert */, $post_extracats );
2061  }

2063  
2064  /**
2065   * Mass create.
2066   *
2067   * Create multiple posts from one post.
2068   *
2069   * @param object Instance of Item class (by reference).
2070   * @param boolean true if create paragraphs at each line break
2071   * @return array The posts, by reference.
2072   */
2073  function & create_multiple_posts( & $Item, $linebreak = false )
2074  {
2075      $Items = array();
2076  
2077      // Parse text into titles and contents:
2078      $current_title = '';
2079      $current_data  = '';
2080  
2081      // Append a newline to the end of the original contents to make sure
2082      // that the last item gets created - this saves a second loop.
2083      foreach( explode( "\n", $Item->content."\n" ) as $line )
2084      {
2085          $line = trim( strip_tags( $line ) );
2086  
2087          if( $current_title === '' && $line !== '' )
2088          {    // We got a new title:
2089              $current_title = $line;
2090          }
2091          elseif( $current_title !== '' )
2092          {
2093              if( $line !== '' )
2094              {    // We got a new paragraph for this post:
2095                  if( $linebreak )
2096                  {
2097                      $current_data .= '<p>'.$line.'</p>';
2098                  }
2099                  else
2100                  {
2101                      $current_data .= $line.' ';
2102                  }
2103              }
2104              else
2105              {    // End of this post:
2106                  $new_Item = duplicate( $Item );
2107  
2108                  $new_Item->set_param( 'title', 'string', $current_title );
2109  
2110                  if( !$linebreak )
2111                  {
2112                      $current_data = trim( $current_data );
2113                  }
2114                  $new_Item->set_param( 'content', 'string', $current_data );
2115  
2116                  $Items[] = $new_Item;
2117  
2118                  $current_title = '';
2119                  $current_data  = '';
2120              }
2121          }
2122      }
2123  
2124      return $Items;
2125  }
2126  
2127  /**
2128   *
2129   * Check if new category needs to be created or not (after post editing).
2130   * If the new category radio is checked creates the new category and set it to post category
2131   * If the new category checkbox is checked creates the new category and set it to post extracat
2132   *
2133   * Function is called during post creation or post update
2134   *
2135   * @param Object Post category (by reference).
2136   * @param Array Post extra categories (by reference).
2137   * @return boolean true - if there is no new category, or new category created succesfull; false if new category creation failed.
2138   */
2139  function check_categories( & $post_category, & $post_extracats )
2140  {
2141      $post_category = param( 'post_category', 'integer', -1 );
2142      $post_extracats = param( 'post_extracats', 'array:integer', array() );
2143      global $Messages, $Blog, $blog;
2144  
2145      load_class( 'chapters/model/_chaptercache.class.php', 'ChapterCache' );
2146      $ChapterCache = & get_ChapterCache();
2147  
2148      if( $post_category == -1 )
2149      { // no main cat select
2150          if( count( $post_extracats ) == 0 )
2151          { // no extra cat select
2152              $post_category = $Blog->get_default_cat_ID();
2153          }
2154          else
2155          { // first extracat become main_cat
2156              if( get_allow_cross_posting() >= 2 )
2157              { // allow moving posts between different blogs is enabled, set first selected cat as main cat
2158                  $post_category = $post_extracats[0];
2159              }
2160              else
2161              { // allow moving posts between different blogs is disabled - we need a main cat from $blog
2162                  foreach( $post_extracats as $cat )
2163                  {
2164                      if( get_catblog( $cat ) != $blog )
2165                      { // this cat is not from $blog
2166                          continue;
2167                      }
2168                      // set first cat from $blog as main cat
2169                      $post_category = $cat;
2170                      break;
2171                  }
2172                  if( $post_category == -1 )
2173                  { // wasn't cat selected from $blog select a default as main cat
2174                      $post_category = $Blog->get_default_cat_ID();
2175                  }
2176              }
2177          }
2178          if( $post_category )
2179          { // If main cat is not a new category, and has been autoselected
2180              $Chapter = & $ChapterCache->get_by_ID( $post_category );
2181              $post_category_Blog = $Chapter->get_Blog();
2182              $Messages->add( sprintf( T_('The main category for this post has been automatically set to "%s" (Blog "%s")'),
2183                  $Chapter->get_name(), $post_category_Blog->get( 'name') ), 'warning' );
2184          }
2185      }
2186  
2187      if( ! $post_category || in_array( 0, $post_extracats ) )    // if category key is 0 => means it is a new category
2188      {
2189          global $current_User;
2190          if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_cats', '', false, $Blog->ID ) )
2191          {    // Current user cannot add a categories for this blog
2192              check_categories_nosave( $post_category, $post_extracats); // set up the category parameters
2193              $Messages->add( T_('You are not allowed to create a new category.'), 'error' );
2194              return false;
2195          }
2196  
2197          $category_name = param( 'category_name', 'string', true );
2198          if( $category_name == '' )
2199          {
2200              $show_error = ! $post_category;    // new main category without name => error message
2201              check_categories_nosave( $post_category, $post_extracats); // set up the category parameters
2202              if( $show_error )
2203              { // new main category without name
2204                  $Messages->add( T_('Please provide a name for new category.'), 'error' );
2205                  return false;
2206              }
2207              return true;
2208          }
2209  
2210          $new_Chapter = & $ChapterCache->new_obj( NULL, $blog );    // create new category object
2211          $new_Chapter->set( 'name', $category_name );
2212          if( $new_Chapter->dbinsert() !== false )
2213          {
2214              $Messages->add( T_('New category created.'), 'success' );
2215              if( ! $post_category ) // if new category is main category
2216              {
2217                  $post_category = $new_Chapter->ID;    // set the new ID
2218              }
2219  
2220              if( ( $extracat_key = array_search( '0', $post_extracats ) ) || $post_extracats[0] == '0' )
2221              {
2222                  if( $extracat_key )
2223                  {
2224                      unset($post_extracats[$extracat_key]);
2225                  }
2226                  else
2227                  {
2228                      unset($post_extracats[0]);
2229                  }
2230                  $post_extracats[] = $new_Chapter->ID;
2231              }
2232  
2233              $ChapterCache->add( $new_Chapter );
2234          }
2235          else
2236          {
2237              $Messages->add( T_('New category creation failed.'), 'error' );
2238              return false;
2239          }
2240      }
2241  
2242      if( get_allow_cross_posting() == 2 )
2243      { // Extra cats in different blogs is disabled, check selected extra cats
2244          $post_category_blog = get_catblog( $post_category );
2245          $ignored_cats = '';
2246          foreach( $post_extracats as $key => $cat )
2247          {
2248              if( get_catblog( $cat ) != $post_category_blog )
2249              { // this cat is not from main category blog, it has to be ingnored
2250                  $Chapter = & $ChapterCache->get_by_ID( $cat );
2251                  $ignored_cats = $ignored_cats.$Chapter->get_name().', ';
2252                  unset( $post_extracats[$key] );
2253              }
2254          }
2255          $ingnored_length = strlen( $ignored_cats );
2256          if( $ingnored_length > 2 )
2257          { // ingnore list is not empty
2258              global $current_User, $admin_url;
2259              if( $current_User->check_perm( 'options', 'view', false ) )
2260              {
2261                  $cross_posting_text = '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=collections&amp;tab=blog_settings">'.T_('cross-posting is disabled').'</a>';
2262              }
2263              else
2264              {
2265                  $cross_posting_text = T_('cross-posting is disabled');
2266              }
2267              $ignored_cats = substr( $ignored_cats, 0, $ingnored_length - 2 );
2268              $Messages->add( sprintf( T_('The category selection "%s" was ignored since %s'),
2269                  $ignored_cats, $cross_posting_text ), 'warning' );
2270          }
2271      }
2272  
2273      // make sure main cat is in extracat list and there are no duplicates
2274      $post_extracats[] = $post_category;
2275      $post_extracats = array_unique( $post_extracats );
2276  
2277      return true;
2278  }
2279  
2280  /*
2281   * Set up params for new category creation
2282   * Set main category to default category, if the current category does not exist yet
2283   * Delete non existing category from extracats
2284   * It is called after simple/expert tab switch, and can be called during post creation or modification
2285   *
2286   * @param Object Post category (by reference).
2287   * @param Array Post extra categories (by reference).
2288   *
2289   */
2290  function check_categories_nosave( & $post_category, & $post_extracats )
2291  {
2292      global $Blog;
2293      $post_category = param( 'post_category', 'integer', $Blog->get_default_cat_ID() );
2294      $post_extracats = param( 'post_extracats', 'array:integer', array() );
2295  
2296      if( ! $post_category )    // if category key is 0 => means it is a new category
2297      {
2298          $post_category = $Blog->get_default_cat_ID();
2299          param( 'new_maincat', 'boolean', 1 );
2300      }
2301  
2302      if( ! empty( $post_extracats) && ( ( $extracat_key = array_search( '0', $post_extracats ) ) || $post_extracats[0] == '0' ) )
2303      {
2304          param( 'new_extracat', 'boolean', 1 );
2305          if( $extracat_key )
2306          {
2307              unset($post_extracats[$extracat_key]);
2308          }
2309          else
2310          {
2311              unset($post_extracats[0]);
2312          }
2313      }
2314  }

2455  /**
2456   * Display CommentList with the given filters
2457   *
2458   * @param integer Blog ID
2459   * @param integer Item ID
2460   * @param array Status filters
2461   * @param integer Limit
2462   * @param array Comments IDs string to exclude from the list
2463   * @param string Filterset name
2464   * @param string Expiry status: 'all', 'active', 'expired'
2465   * @param string Type of the comments: 'feedback' or 'meta'
2466   */
2467  function echo_item_comments( $blog_ID, $item_ID, $statuses = NULL, $currentpage = 1, $limit = NULL, $comment_IDs = array(), $filterset_name = '', $expiry_status = 'active', $comment_type = 'feedback' )
2468  {
2469      global $inc_path, $status_list, $Blog, $admin_url;
2470  
2471      $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
2472      $Blog = & $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID, false, false );
2473  
2474      if( empty( $limit ) )
2475      { // Get default limit from curent user's setting
2476          global $UserSettings;
2477          $limit = $UserSettings->get( 'results_per_page' );
2478      }
2479  
2480      global $CommentList;
2481      $CommentList = new CommentList2( $Blog, $limit, 'CommentCache', '', $filterset_name );
2482  
2483      $exlude_ID_list = NULL;
2484      if( !empty($comment_IDs) )
2485      {
2486          $exlude_ID_list = '-'.implode( ",", $comment_IDs );
2487      }
2488  
2489      if( empty( $statuses ) )
2490      {
2491          $statuses = get_visibility_statuses( 'keys', array( 'redirected', 'trash' ) );
2492      }
2493  
2494      if( $expiry_status == 'all' )
2495      { // Display all comments
2496          $expiry_statuses = array( 'active', 'expired' );
2497      }
2498      else
2499      { // Display active or expired comments
2500          $expiry_statuses = array( $expiry_status );
2501      }
2502  
2503      // if item_ID == -1 then don't use item filter! display all comments from current blog
2504      if( $item_ID == -1 )
2505      {
2506          $item_ID = NULL;
2507      }
2508      // set redirect_to
2509      if( ! is_null( $item_ID ) )
2510      {
2511          if( $comment_type == 'meta' )
2512          { // Check if current user can sees meta comments of this item
2513              global $current_User;
2514              $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
2515              $Item = & $ItemCache->get_by_ID( $item_ID, false, false );
2516              if( ! $Item || empty( $current_User ) || ! $current_User->check_perm( 'meta_comment', 'view', false, $Item ) )
2517              { // Current user has no permissions to view meta comments
2518                  $comment_type = 'feedback';
2519              }
2520          }
2521  
2522          // redirect to the items full view
2523          param( 'redirect_to', 'url', url_add_param( $admin_url, 'ctrl=items&blog='.$blog_ID.'&p='.$item_ID, '&' ) );
2524          param( 'item_id', 'integer', $item_ID );
2525          param( 'currentpage', 'integer', $currentpage );
2526          if( count( $statuses ) == 1 )
2527          {
2528              $show_comments = $statuses[0];
2529          }
2530          else
2531          {
2532              $show_comments = 'all';
2533          }
2534          $comments_number_mode = ( $comment_type == 'meta' ? 'metas' : 'comments' );
2535          param( 'comments_number', 'integer', generic_ctp_number( $item_ID, $comments_number_mode, $show_comments ) );
2536          // Filter list:
2537          $CommentList->set_filters( array(
2538              'types' => $comment_type == 'meta' ? array( 'meta' ) : array( 'comment', 'trackback', 'pingback' ),
2539              'statuses' => $statuses,
2540              'expiry_statuses' => $expiry_statuses,
2541              'comment_ID_list' => $exlude_ID_list,
2542              'post_ID' => $item_ID,
2543              'order' => 'ASC',//$order,
2544              'comments' => $limit,
2545              'page' => $currentpage,
2546          ) );
2547      }
2548      else
2549      { // redirect to the comments full view
2550          param( 'redirect_to', 'url', url_add_param( $admin_url, 'ctrl=comments&blog='.$blog_ID.'&filter=restore', '&' ) );
2551          // this is an ajax call we always have to restore the filterst (we can set filters only without ajax call)
2552          $CommentList->set_filters( array(
2553              'types' => array( 'comment', 'trackback', 'pingback' ),
2554          ) );
2555          $CommentList->restore_filterset();
2556      }
2557  
2558      // Get ready for display (runs the query):
2559      $CommentList->display_init();
2560  
2561      $CommentList->display_if_empty( array(
2562          'before'    => '<div class="bComment"><p>',
2563          'after'     => '</p></div>',
2564          'msg_empty' => T_('No feedback for this post yet...'),
2565      ) );
2566  
2567      // display comments
2568      require $inc_path.'comments/views/_comment_list.inc.php';
2569  }
2570

2572  /**
2573   * Display a comment corresponding the given comment id
2574   *
2575   * @param int comment id
2576   * @param string where to redirect after comment edit
2577   * @param boolean true to set the new redirect param, false otherwise
2578   * @param integer Comment index in the current list
2579   */
2580  function echo_comment( $comment_ID, $redirect_to = NULL, $save_context = false, $comment_index = NULL )
2581  {
2582      global $current_User, $localtimenow;
2583  
2584      $CommentCache = & get_CommentCache();
2585      /**
2586      * @var Comment
2587      */
2588      $Comment = $CommentCache->get_by_ID( $comment_ID );
2589      $Item = & $Comment->get_Item();
2590      $Blog = & $Item->get_Blog();
2591  
2592      $is_published = ( $Comment->get( 'status' ) == 'published' );
2593      $expiry_delay = $Item->get_setting( 'comment_expiry_delay' );
2594      $is_expired = ( !empty( $expiry_delay ) && ( ( $localtimenow - mysql2timestamp( $Comment->get( 'date' ) ) ) > $expiry_delay ) );
2595  
2596      echo '<a name="c'.$comment_ID.'"></a>';
2597      echo '<div id="comment_'.$comment_ID.'" class="bComment bComment';
2598      // check if comment is expired
2599      if( $is_expired )
2600      { // comment is expired
2601          echo 'expired';
2602      }
2603      elseif( $Comment->is_meta() )
2604      { // meta comment
2605          echo 'meta';
2606      }
2607      else
2608      { // comment is not expired and not meta
2609          $Comment->status('raw');
2610      }
2611      echo '">';
2612  
2613      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'comment!CURSTATUS', 'moderate', false, $Comment ) ||
2614          ( $Comment->is_meta() && $current_User->check_perm( 'meta_comment', 'view', false, $Item ) ) )
2615      { // User can moderate this comment OR Comment is meta and current user can view it
2616          echo '<div class="bSmallHead">';
2617          echo '<div>';
2618  
2619          if( $Comment->is_meta() )
2620          { // Display ID for each meta comment
2621              echo '<span class="badge badge-info">'.$comment_index.'</span> ';
2622          }
2623  
2624          echo '<div class="bSmallHeadRight">';
2625          $Comment->permanent_link( array(
2626                  'before' => '',
2627                  'text'   => $Comment->is_meta() ? T_('Meta link') : '#text#'
2628              ) );
2629          echo '</div>';
2630  
2631          echo '<span class="bDate">';
2632          $Comment->date();
2633          echo '</span>@<span class = "bTime">';
2634          $Comment->time( '#short_time' );
2635          echo '</span>';
2636  
2637          if( $Comment->is_meta() )
2638          { // Display only author for meta comment
2639              $Comment->author( '', '', ' &middot; '.T_('Author').': ', '' );
2640          }
2641          else
2642          { // Display the detailed info for standard comment
2643              $Comment->author_email( '', ' &middot; Email: <span class="bEmail">', '</span>' );
2644              echo ' &middot; <span class="bKarma">';
2645              $Comment->spam_karma( T_('Spam Karma').': %s%', T_('No Spam Karma') );
2646              echo '</span>';
2647  
2648              echo '</div>';
2649              echo '<div style="padding-top:3px">';
2650              if( $is_expired )
2651              {
2652                  echo '<div class="bSmallHeadRight">';
2653                  echo '<span class="bExpired">'.T_('EXPIRED').'</span>';
2654                  echo '</div>';
2655              }
2656              $Comment->author_ip( 'IP: <span class="bIP">', '</span> &middot; ', true, true );
2657              $Comment->ip_country( '', ' &middot; ' );
2658              $Comment->author_url_with_actions( /*$redirect_to*/'', true, true );
2659          }
2660          echo '</div>';
2661          echo '</div>';
2662  
2663          echo '<div class="bCommentContent">';
2664          $Comment->format_status( array(
2665                  'template' => '<div class="floatright"><span class="note status_$status$"><span>$status_title$</span></span></div>',
2666              ) );
2667          if( ! $Comment->is_meta() )
2668          { // Don't display the titles for meta comments
2669              echo '<div class="bCommentTitle">';
2670              echo $Comment->get_title();
2671              if( get_param( 'p' ) == '' )
2672              { // Don't display this title on a post view page
2673                  echo ' '.T_('in response to')
2674                          .' <a href="?ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID.'&amp;p='.$Item->ID.'">'.$Item->dget('title').'</a>';
2675              }
2676              echo '</div>';
2677          }
2678          echo '<div class="bCommentText">';
2679          $Comment->rating();
2680          $Comment->avatar( 'crop-top-80x80' );
2681          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'meta_comment', 'edit', false, $Comment ) )
2682          { // Put the comment content into this container to edit by ajax
2683              echo '<div id="editable_comment_'.$Comment->ID.'" class="editable_comment_content">';
2684          }
2685          $Comment->content( 'htmlbody', 'true' );
2686          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'meta_comment', 'edit', false, $Comment ) )
2687          { // End of the container that is used to edit meta comment by ajax
2688              echo '</div>';
2689          }
2690          echo '</div>';
2691          echo '</div>';
2692  
2693          echo '<div class="CommentActionsArea">';
2694  
2695          echo '<div class="floatleft">';
2696  
2697          // Display edit button if current user has the rights:
2698          $Comment->edit_link( ' ', ' ', get_icon( 'edit_button' ).' '.T_('Edit'), '#', button_class( 'text_primary' ).' w80px', '&amp;', $save_context, $redirect_to );
2699  
2700          echo '<span class="'.button_class( 'group' ).'">';
2701          // Display publish NOW button if current user has the rights:
2702          $link_params = array(
2703              'class'        => button_class( 'text' ),
2704              'save_context' => $save_context,
2705              'ajax_button'  => true,
2706              'redirect_to'  => $redirect_to,
2707          );
2708          $Comment->raise_link( $link_params );
2709  
2710          // Display deprecate button if current user has the rights:
2711          $Comment->lower_link( $link_params );
2712  
2713          $next_status_in_row = $Comment->get_next_status( false );
2714          if( $next_status_in_row && $next_status_in_row[0] != 'deprecated' )
2715          { // Display deprecate button if current user has the rights:
2716              $Comment->deprecate_link( '', '', get_icon( 'move_down_grey', 'imgtag', array( 'title' => '' ) ), '#', button_class(), '&amp;', true, true );
2717          }
2718  
2719          // Display delete button if current user has the rights:
2720          $Comment->delete_link( '', '', '#', '#', button_class( 'text' ), false, '&amp;', $save_context, true, '#', $redirect_to );
2721          echo '</span>';
2722  
2723          echo '</div>';
2724  
2725          if( ! $Comment->is_meta() )
2726          { // Display Spam Voting system
2727              $Comment->vote_spam( '', '', '&amp;', $save_context, true );
2728          }
2729  
2730          echo '<div class="clear"></div>';
2731          echo '</div>';
2732      }
2733      else
2734      {    // No permissions to moderate of this comment, just preview
2735          echo '<div class="bSmallHead">';
2736          echo '<div>';
2737  
2738          echo '<div class="bSmallHeadRight">';
2739          echo T_('Visibility').': ';
2740          echo '<span class="bStatus">';
2741          $Comment->status();
2742          echo '</span>';
2743          echo '</div>';
2744  
2745          echo '<span class="bDate">';
2746          $Comment->date();
2747          echo '</span>@<span class = "bTime">';
2748          $Comment->time( '#short_time' );
2749          echo '</span>';
2750  
2751          echo '</div>';
2752          echo '</div>';
2753  
2754          if( $is_published )
2755          {
2756              echo '<div class="bCommentContent">';
2757              echo '<div class="bCommentTitle">';
2758              echo $Comment->get_title();
2759              echo '</div>';
2760              echo '<div class="bCommentText">';
2761              $Comment->rating();
2762              $Comment->avatar();
2763              $Comment->content();
2764              echo '</div>';
2765              echo '</div>';
2766          }
2767  
2768          echo '<div class="clear"></div>';
2769      }
2770  
2771      echo '</div>'; // end
2772  }

2775  /**
2776   * Display a page link of the comments on item full view
2777   *
2778   * @param integer the item id
2779   * @param string link text
2780   * @param integer the page number
2781   */
2782  function echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, $text, $page, $params = array() )
2783  {
2784      $params = array_merge( array(
2785              'page_before' => ' ',
2786              'page_after'  => '',
2787          ), $params );
2788  
2789      global $blog, $admin_url;
2790      $page_param = $page > 1 ? '&amp;currentpage='.$page : '';
2791      $comment_type = get_param( 'comment_type' );
2792      $page_param .= $comment_type == 'meta' ? '&amp;comment_type=meta' : '';
2793      echo $params['page_before']
2794              .'<a href="'.url_add_param( $admin_url, 'ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$blog.'&amp;p='.$item_ID.$page_param.'#comments' ).'" onclick="startRefreshComments( \''.request_from().'\', '.$item_ID.', '.$page.', \''.$comment_type.'\' ); return false;">'.$text.'</a>'
2795          .$params['page_after'];
2796  }

2799  /**
2800   * Display page links of the comments on item full view
2801   *
2802   * @param integer the item id
2803   * @param integer current page number
2804   * @param integer all comments number in the list
2805   * @param array Params
2806   */
2807  function echo_comment_pages( $item_ID, $currentpage, $comments_number, $params = array() )
2808  {
2809      global $UserSettings;
2810  
2811      $params = array_merge( array(
2812              'list_span'  => 11, // The number of pages to display for one time
2813              'page_size'  => $UserSettings->get( 'results_per_page' ), // The number of comments on one page
2814              'list_start' => '<div class="results_nav" id="paging">',
2815              'list_end'   => '</div>',
2816              'prev_text'  => T_('Previous'),
2817              'next_text'  => T_('Next'),
2818              'pages_text' => '<strong>'.T_('Pages').'</strong>:',
2819              'page_before'         => ' ',
2820              'page_after'          => '',
2821              'page_current_before' => ' <strong>',
2822              'page_current_after'  => '</strong>',
2823          ), $params );
2824  
2825      if( $comments_number == 0 )
2826      { // No comments
2827          return;
2828      }
2829  
2830      $total_pages = ceil( $comments_number / $params['page_size'] );
2831  
2832      if( $total_pages < 2 )
2833      { // No pages
2834          return;
2835      }
2836  
2837      if( $currentpage > $total_pages )
2838      { // current page number is greater then all page number, set current page to the last existing page
2839          $currentpage = $total_pages;
2840      }
2841  
2842      // Set first page
2843      if( $currentpage <= intval( $params['list_span'] / 2 ) )
2844      { // the current page number is small
2845          $first_page = 1;
2846      }
2847      elseif( $currentpage > $total_pages - intval( $params['list_span'] / 2 ) )
2848      { // the current page number is big
2849          $first_page = max( 1, $total_pages - $params['list_span'] + 1 );
2850      }
2851      else
2852      { // the current page number can be centered
2853          $first_page = $currentpage - intval( $params['list_span'] / 2 );
2854      }
2855  
2856      // Set last page
2857      if( $currentpage > $total_pages - intval( $params['list_span'] / 2 ) )
2858      { // the current page number is big
2859          $last_page = $total_pages;
2860      }
2861      else
2862      {
2863          $last_page = min( $total_pages, $first_page + $params['list_span'] - 1 );
2864      }
2865  
2866      echo '<div id="currentpage" value='.$currentpage.' /></div>';
2867      echo $params['list_start'];
2868      if( $comments_number > 0 )
2869      {
2870          echo $params['pages_text'];
2871          if( $currentpage > 1 )
2872          { // link to previous page
2873              echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, $params['prev_text'], $currentpage - 1, $params );
2874          }
2875          if( $first_page > 1 )
2876          { // link to first page
2877              echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, '1', '1', $params );
2878          }
2879          if( $first_page > 2 )
2880          { // link to previous pages
2881              $page_i = ceil( $first_page / 2 );
2882              echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, '...', $page_i, $params );
2883          }
2884          for( $i = $first_page; $i <= $last_page; $i++ )
2885          { // Display list with pages
2886              if( $i == $currentpage )
2887              {
2888                  echo $params['page_current_before'].$i.$params['page_current_after'];
2889              }
2890              else
2891              {
2892                  echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, $i, $i, $params );
2893              }
2894          }
2895          if( $last_page < $total_pages - 1 )
2896          { // link to next pages
2897              $page_i = $last_page + floor( ( $total_pages - $last_page ) / 2 );
2898              echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, '...', $page_i, $params );
2899          }
2900          if( $last_page < $total_pages )
2901          { // link to last page
2902              echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, $total_pages, $total_pages, $params );
2903          }
2904          if( $currentpage < $total_pages )
2905          { // link to next page
2906              echo_comment_pagenumber( $item_ID, $params['next_text'], $currentpage + 1, $params );
2907          }
2908      }
2909      echo $params['list_end'];
2910  }
2911  
2912  
2913  /**
2914   * Check permission for editing of the item by current user
2915   *
2916   * @param integer post ID
2917   * @param boolean Set TRUE if we want to redirect when user cannot edit this post
2918   * @return boolean TRUE - user can edit this post
2919   */
2920  function check_item_perm_edit( $post_ID, $do_redirect = true )
2921  {
2922      global $Messages;
2923      global $Blog, $current_User;
2924  
2925      $user_can_edit = false;
2926  
2927      if( $post_ID > 0 )
2928      { // Check permissions for editing of the current item:
2929          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache ();
2930          $edited_Item = $ItemCache->get_by_ID ( $post_ID );
2931          $user_can_edit = $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'edit', false, $edited_Item );
2932          $permission_message = T_('You don\'t have permission to edit this post');
2933  
2934          if( $user_can_edit )
2935          { // Check if the post type is enabled:
2936  
2937              if( ! $edited_Item->is_type_enabled() )
2938              { // Don't allow to use a not enabled post type:
2939                  $user_can_edit = false;
2940                  if( $edited_ItemType = & $edited_Item->get_ItemType() )
2941                  {
2942                      $permission_message = sprintf( T_( 'The post you are trying to edit uses the post type #%d "%s" which is currently disabled. Thus you cannot edit this post.' ),
2943                          $edited_ItemType->ID, $edited_ItemType->get( 'name' ) );
2944                  }
2945                  else
2946                  {
2947                      $permission_message = T_( 'The post you are trying to edit uses an unknown post type. Thus you cannot edit this post.' );
2948                  }
2949              }
2950          }
2951      }
2952      else
2953      { // Check permissions for creating of a new item:
2954          $perm_target = empty( $Blog ) ? NULL : $Blog->ID;
2955          $user_can_edit = $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_post_statuses', 'edit', false, $perm_target );
2956          $permission_message = T_('You don\'t have permission to post into this blog');
2957      }
2958  
2959      if( ! $user_can_edit )
2960      {
2961          if( $do_redirect )
2962          {    // Redirect to the blog url for users without messaging permission
2963              $Messages->add( $permission_message );
2964              if( empty( $Blog ) )
2965              {    // Bad request without blog ID
2966                  global $home_url;
2967                  $redirect_to = $home_url;
2968              }
2969              else
2970              {    // Redirect to the current blog
2971                  $redirect_to = $Blog->gen_blogurl();
2972              }
2973              header_redirect( $redirect_to, 302 );
2974              // will have exited
2975          }
2976          else
2977          {    // Current user cannot edit this post
2978              return false;
2979          }
2980      }
2981  
2982      return true;
2983  }
2984  
2985  
2986  /**
2987   * Check permission for creating of a new item by current user
2988   *
2989   * @return boolean, TRUE if user can create a new post for the current blog
2990   */
2991  function check_item_perm_create()
2992  {
2993      global $Blog;
2994  
2995      if( empty( $Blog ) )
2996      {    // Strange case, but we restrict to create a new post
2997          return false;
2998      }
2999  
3000      if( ! is_logged_in( false ) || ! $Blog->get_setting( 'in_skin_editing' ) )
3001      {    // Don't allow anonymous users to create a new post & If setting is OFF
3002          return false;
3003      }
3004      else
3005      {    // Check permissions for current user
3006          global $current_User;
3007          return $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_post_statuses', 'edit', false, $Blog->ID );
3008      }
3009  
3010      return true;
3011  }

3023  /**
3024   * Template tag: Get a link to create a new post
3025   *
3026   * @return string|false
3027   */
3028  function get_item_new_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '', $link_title = '#' )
3029  {
3030      global $Blog;
3031  
3032      if( ! check_item_perm_create() )
3033      {    // Don't allow users to create a new post
3034          return false;
3035      }
3036  
3037      if( $link_text == '' )
3038      {    // Default text
3039          $link_text = T_('Write a new post');
3040      }
3041  
3042      if( $link_title == '#' ) $link_title = T_('Write a new post');
3043  
3044      $r = $before
3045          .'<a href="'.url_add_param( $Blog->get( 'url' ), 'disp=edit' ).'" title="'.$link_title.'">'
3046          .$link_text
3047          .'</a>'
3048          .$after;
3049  
3050      return $r;
3051  }

3054  /**
3055   * Display location select elements (Country, Region, Subregion, City)
3056   *
3057   * @param object Form
3058   * @param object Edited Item
3059   * @param array Params
3060   */
3061  function echo_item_location_form( & $Form, & $edited_Item, $params = array() )
3062  {
3063      load_class( 'regional/model/_country.class.php', 'Country' );
3064      load_funcs( 'regional/model/_regional.funcs.php' );
3065  
3066      if( ! $edited_Item->country_visible() )
3067      {    // If country is NOT visible it means all other location fields also are not visible, so exit here
3068          return;

3070

3072              'fold' => false,
3073          ), $params );
3074

3076

3078

3081      { // A post with special type should always has the location fields as not required

3085

3143  /**
3144   * Save object Item into Session
3145   *
3146   * @param object Item
3147   */
3148  function set_session_Item( $Item )
3149  {
3150      global $Session;
3151  
3152      if( ! is_object( $Item ) )
3153      {
3154          return;
3155      }
3156  
3157      $edited_items = $Session->get( 'edited_items' );
3158  
3159      if( ! is_array( $edited_items ) )
3160      { // Initialize an array for Item objects
3161          $edited_items = array();
3162      }
3163  
3164      $edited_items[ intval( $Item->ID ) ] = $Item;
3165  
3166      $Session->delete( 'edited_items' );
3167      $Session->set( 'edited_items', $edited_items );
3168  }

3171  /**
3172   * Get object Item from Session
3173   *
3174   * @param integer Item ID
3175   * @return object Item
3176   */
3177  function get_session_Item( $item_ID = 0 )
3178  {
3179      global $Session;
3180  
3181      $edited_items = $Session->get( 'edited_items' );
3182  
3183      if( isset( $edited_items[ $item_ID ] ) && is_object( $edited_items[ $item_ID ] ) )
3184      {
3185          $edited_Item = $edited_items[ $item_ID ];
3186  
3187          // Reload main Chapter
3188          $edited_Item->main_Chapter = NULL;
3189          $edited_Item->get_main_Chapter();
3190  
3191          // Reload Post Type
3192          $edited_Item->ItemType = NULL;
3193          $edited_Item->get_ItemType();
3194  
3195          return $edited_Item;
3196      }
3197  
3198      return NULL;
3199  }

3210

3225  /**
3226   * Prepare item content
3227   *
3228   * @param string Content
3229   * @return string Content
3230   */
3231  function prepare_item_content( $content )
3232  {
3233      // Convert the content separators to new format:
3234      $old_separators = array(
3235              '&lt;!--more--&gt;', '<!--more-->', '<p>[teaserbreak]</p>',
3236              '&lt;!--nextpage--&gt;', '<!--nextpage-->', '<p>[pagebreak]</p>'
3237          );
3238      $new_separators = array(
3239              '[teaserbreak]', '[teaserbreak]', '[teaserbreak]',
3240              '[pagebreak]', '[pagebreak]', '[pagebreak]'
3241          );
3242      if( strpos( $content, '<code' ) !== false || strpos( $content, '<pre' ) !== false )
3243      { // Call prepare_item_content_callback() on everything outside code/pre:
3244          $content = callback_on_non_matching_blocks( $content,
3245              '~<(code|pre)[^>]*>.*?</\1>~is',
3246              'replace_content', array( $old_separators, $new_separators, 'str' ) );
3247      }
3248      else
3249      { // No code/pre blocks, replace on the whole thing
3250          $content = str_replace( $old_separators, $new_separators, $content );
3251      }
3252  
3253      return $content;
3254  }

3274              2 => /* TRANS: Priority name */ T_('2 - High'),
3275              3 => /* TRANS: Priority name */ T_('3 - Medium'),
3276              4 => /* TRANS: Priority name */ T_('4 - Low'),
3277              5 => /* TRANS: Priority name */ T_('5 - Lowest'),
3278          );
3279  
3280      return $priorities;
3281  }

3329  /**
3330   * Display the manual pages results table
3331   *
3332   * @param array Params
3333   */
3334  function items_manual_results_block( $params = array() )
3335  {
3336      // Make sure we are not missing any param:
3337      $params = array_merge( array(
3338              'results_param_prefix' => 'items_manual_',
3339          ), $params );
3340  
3341      if( !is_logged_in() )
3342      { // Only logged in users can access to this function
3343          return;
3344      }
3345  
3346      global $current_User, $blog, $Blog, $admin_url, $Session;
3347  
3348      $result_fadeout = $Session->get( 'fadeout_array' );
3349  
3350      $cat_ID = param( 'cat_ID', 'integer', 0, true );
3351  
3352      if( empty( $Blog ) )
3353      { // Init Blog
3354          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
3355          $blog = get_param( 'blog' );
3356          if( !empty( $blog ) )
3357          { // Get Blog by ID
3358              $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog, false );
3359          }
3360          if( empty( $Blog ) && !empty( $cat_ID ) )
3361          { // Get Blog from chapter ID
3362              $ChapterCache = & get_ChapterCache();
3363              if( $Chapter = & $ChapterCache->get_by_ID( $cat_ID, false ) )
3364              {
3365                  $Blog = $Chapter->get_Blog();
3366                  $blog = $Blog->ID;
3367              }
3368          }
3369      }
3370  
3371      if( empty( $Blog ) || $Blog->get( 'type' ) != 'manual' )
3372      { // No Blog, Exit here
3373          return;
3374      }
3375  
3376      if( is_ajax_content() )
3377      {
3378          $order_action = param( 'order_action', 'string' );
3379  
3380          if( $order_action == 'update' )
3381          { // Update an order to new value
3382              $new_value = (int)param( 'new_value', 'string', 0 );
3383              $order_data = param( 'order_data', 'string' );
3384              $order_data = explode( '-', $order_data );
3385              $order_obj_ID = (int)$order_data[2];
3386              if( $order_obj_ID > 0 )
3387              {
3388                  switch( $order_data[1] )
3389                  {
3390                      case 'chapter':
3391                          // Update chapter order
3392                          $ChapterCache = & get_ChapterCache();
3393                          if( $updated_Chapter = & $ChapterCache->get_by_ID( $order_obj_ID, false ) )
3394                          {
3395                              if( $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_cats', '', false, $updated_Chapter->blog_ID ) )
3396                              { // Check permission to edit this Chapter
3397                                  $updated_Chapter->set( 'order', $new_value );
3398                                  $updated_Chapter->dbupdate();
3399                                  $ChapterCache->clear();
3400                              }
3401                          }
3402                          break;
3403  
3404                      case 'item':
3405                          // Update item order
3406                          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
3407                          if( $updated_Item = & $ItemCache->get_by_ID( $order_obj_ID, false ) )
3408                          {
3409                              if( $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'edit', false, $updated_Item ) )
3410                              { // Check permission to edit this Item
3411                                  $updated_Item->set( 'order', $new_value );
3412                                  $updated_Item->dbupdate();
3413                              }
3414                          }
3415                          break;
3416                  }
3417              }
3418          }
3419      }
3420  
3421      load_class( '_core/ui/_uiwidget.class.php', 'Table' );
3422

3424

3426

3429      $Table->global_icon( T_('Add new chapter...'), 'add', $admin_url.'?ctrl=chapters&amp;action=new&amp;blog='.$blog.$redirect_page, ' '.T_('Add top level chapter').' &raquo;', 3, 4 );
3430  
3431      $Table->cols[] = array(
3432                              'th' => T_('Name'),
3433                          );
3434      $Table->cols[] = array(
3435                              'th' => T_('URL "slug"'),
3436                          );
3437      $Table->cols[] = array(
3438                              'th' => T_('Order'),
3439                              'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3440                          );
3441      $Table->cols[] = array(
3442                              'th' => T_('Actions'),
3443                          );
3444  
3445      if( is_ajax_content() )
3446      { // init results param by template name
3447          if( !isset( $params[ 'skin_type' ] ) || ! isset( $params[ 'skin_name' ] ) )
3448          {
3449              debug_die( 'Invalid ajax results request!' );
3450          }
3451          $Table->init_params_by_skin( $params[ 'skin_type' ], $params[ 'skin_name' ] );
3452      }
3453  
3454      $Table->display_init( NULL, $result_fadeout );
3455  
3456      echo $Table->params['before'];
3457  
3458      $Table->display_head();
3459  
3460      echo $Table->replace_vars( $Table->params['content_start'] );
3461  
3462      $Table->display_list_start();
3463  
3464          $Table->display_col_headers();
3465  
3466          $Table->display_body_start();
3467  
3468          manual_display_chapters();
3469  
3470          $Table->display_body_end();
3471  
3472      $Table->display_list_end();
3473  
3474      // Flush fadeout
3475      $Session->delete( 'fadeout_array');
3476  
3477      echo $Table->params['content_end'];
3478  
3479      echo $Table->params['after'];
3480  
3481      if( !is_ajax_content() )
3482      { // Create this hidden div to get a function name for AJAX request
3483          echo '<div id="'.$params['results_param_prefix'].'ajax_callback" style="display:none">'.__FUNCTION__.'</div>';
3484      }
3485  }

3488  /**
3489   * Display the created items results table
3490   *
3491   * @param array Params
3492   */
3493  function items_created_results_block( $params = array() )
3494  {
3495      // Make sure we are not missing any param:
3496      $params = array_merge( array(
3497              'edited_User'          => NULL,
3498              'results_param_prefix' => 'actv_postown_',
3499              'results_title'        => T_('Posts created by the user'),
3500              'results_no_text'      => T_('User has not created any posts'),
3501          ), $params );
3502  
3503      if( !is_logged_in() )
3504      {    // Only logged in users can access to this function
3505          return;
3506      }
3507  
3508      global $current_User;
3509      if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'moderate' ) )
3510      {    // Check minimum permission:
3511          return;
3512      }
3513  
3514      $edited_User = $params['edited_User'];
3515      if( !$edited_User )
3516      {    // No defined User, probably the function is calling from AJAX request
3517          $user_ID = param( 'user_ID', 'integer', 0 );
3518          if( empty( $user_ID ) )
3519          {    // Bad request, Exit here
3520              return;
3521          }
3522          $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
3523          if( ( $edited_User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false ) ) === false )
3524          {    // Bad request, Exit here
3525              return;
3526          }
3527      }
3528  
3529      global $DB, $AdminUI;
3530  
3531      param( 'user_tab', 'string', '', true );
3532      param( 'user_ID', 'integer', 0, true );
3533  
3534      $SQL = new SQL();
3535      $SQL->SELECT( '*' );
3536      $SQL->FROM( 'T_items__item' );
3537      $SQL->WHERE( 'post_creator_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $edited_User->ID ) );
3538  
3539      // Create result set:
3540      $created_items_Results = new Results( $SQL->get(), $params['results_param_prefix'], 'D' );
3541      $created_items_Results->Cache = & get_ItemCache();
3542      $created_items_Results->title = $params['results_title'];
3543      $created_items_Results->no_results_text = $params['results_no_text'];
3544  
3545      // Get a count of the post which current user can delete
3546      $deleted_posts_created_count = count( $edited_User->get_deleted_posts( 'created' ) );
3547      if( ( $created_items_Results->get_total_rows() > 0 ) && ( $deleted_posts_created_count > 0 ) )
3548      {    // Display action icon to delete all records if at least one record exists & current user can delete at least one item created by user
3549          $created_items_Results->global_icon( sprintf( T_('Delete all post created by %s'), $edited_User->login ), 'delete', '?ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=activity&amp;action=delete_all_posts_created&amp;user_ID='.$edited_User->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('user'), ' '.T_('Delete all'), 3, 4 );
3550      }
3551  
3552      // Initialize Results object
3553      items_results( $created_items_Results, array(
3554              'field_prefix' => 'post_',
3555              'display_ord' => false,
3556              'display_history' => false,
3557          ) );
3558  
3559      $results_params = $AdminUI->get_template( 'Results' );
3560      $display_params = array(
3561          'before' => str_replace( '>', ' style="margin-top:25px" id="created_posts_result">', $results_params['before'] ),
3562      );
3563  
3564      if( is_ajax_content() )
3565      { // init results param by template name
3566          if( !isset( $params[ 'skin_type' ] ) || ! isset( $params[ 'skin_name' ] ) )
3567          {
3568              debug_die( 'Invalid ajax results request!' );
3569          }
3570          $created_items_Results->init_params_by_skin( $params[ 'skin_type' ], $params[ 'skin_name' ] );
3571      }
3572  
3573      $created_items_Results->display( $display_params );
3574  
3575      if( !is_ajax_content() )
3576      {    // Create this hidden div to get a function name for AJAX request
3577          echo '<div id="'.$params['results_param_prefix'].'ajax_callback" style="display:none">'.__FUNCTION__.'</div>';
3578      }
3579  }

3686  function items_list_block_by_page( $params = array() )

3691              'image_size'   => 'fit-400x320',
3692              'block_start'  => '<div class="navigation ajax">',

3696          ), $params );

3699      {    // Exit here if skin cannot be initialized
3700          return;
3701      }
3702

3707          // ----------------------------END ITEM BLOCK  ----------------------------
3708      }
3709  
3710      // -------------------- PREV/NEXT PAGE LINKS (POST LIST MODE) --------------------
3711      mainlist_page_links( $params );

3713  }

3741  /**
3742   * Initialize Results object for items list
3743   *
3744   * @param object Results
3745   * @param array Params
3746   */
3747  function items_results( & $items_Results, $params = array() )
3748  {
3749      global $Blog;
3750  
3751      // Make sure we are not missing any param:
3752      $params = array_merge( array(
3753              'tab'                        => '',
3754              'field_prefix'               => '',
3755              'display_date'               => true,
3756              'display_permalink'          => true,
3757              'display_blog'               => true,
3758              'display_author'             => true,
3759              'display_type'               => true,
3760              'display_title'              => true,
3761              'display_title_flag'         => true,
3762              'display_title_status'       => true,
3763              'display_visibility_actions' => true,
3764              'display_status'             => true,
3765              'display_ord'                => true,
3766              'display_status'             => true,
3767              'display_history'            => true,
3768              'display_actions'            => true,
3769          ), $params );
3770  
3771      if( $params['display_date'] )
3772      {    // Display Date column
3773          $td = '<span class="date">@get_issue_date()@</span>';
3774          if( $params['display_permalink'] )
3775          {
3776              $td = '@get_permanent_link( get_icon(\'permalink\'), \'\', \'\', \'auto\' )@ '.$td;
3777          }
3778          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3779                  'th' => T_('Date'),
3780                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'datestart',
3781                  'default_dir' => 'D',
3782                  'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3783                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3784                  'td' => $td,
3785              );
3786      }
3787  
3788      if( $params['display_blog'] )
3789      {    // Display Blog column
3790          if( !empty( $Blog ) && $Blog->get_setting( 'aggregate_coll_IDs' ) )
3791          { // Aggregated blog: display name of blog
3792              $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3793                      'th' => T_('Collection'),
3794                      'th_class' => 'nowrap',
3795                      'td_class' => 'nowrap',
3796                      'td' => '@load_Blog()@<a href="~regenerate_url( \'blog,results_order\', \'blog=@blog_ID@\' )~">@Blog->dget(\'shortname\')@</a>',
3797                  );
3798          }
3799      }
3800  
3801      if( $params['display_author'] )
3802      { // Display Author column:
3803          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3804                  'th' => T_('Author'),
3805                  'th_class' => 'nowrap',
3806                  'td_class' => 'nowrap',
3807                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'creator_user_ID',
3808                  'td' => '%get_user_identity_link( NULL, #post_creator_user_ID# )%',
3809              );
3810      }
3811  
3812      if( $params['display_type'] )
3813      { // Display Type column:
3814          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3815                  'th' => T_('Type'),
3816                  'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3817                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3818                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'ityp_ID',
3819                  'td' => '%item_row_type( {Obj} )%',
3820              );
3821      }
3822  
3823      if( $params['display_title'] )
3824      { // Display Title column
3825          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3826                  'th' => T_('Title'),
3827                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'title',
3828                  'td_class' => 'tskst_$post_pst_ID$',
3829                  'td' => '<strong lang="@get(\'locale\')@">%task_title_link( {Obj}, '.(int)$params['display_title_flag'].' )%</strong>',
3830              );
3831      }
3832  
3833      if( $params['display_status'] )
3834      { // Display Ord column
3835          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3836                  'th' => T_('Status'),
3837                  'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3838                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap left',
3839                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'status',
3840                  'td' => '%item_row_status( {Obj}, {CUR_IDX} )%',
3841              );
3842      }
3843  
3844      if( $params['display_ord'] )
3845      { // Display Ord column
3846          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3847                  'th' => T_('Ord'),
3848                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'order',
3849                  'td_class' => 'right',
3850                  'td' => '$post_order$',
3851              );
3852      }
3853  
3854      if( $params['display_history'] )
3855      { // Display History (i) column
3856          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3857                  'th' => /* TRANS: abbrev for info */ T_('i'),
3858                  'th_title' => T_('Item history information'),
3859                  'order' => $params['field_prefix'].'datemodified',
3860                  'default_dir' => 'D',
3861                  'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3862                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3863                  'td' => '@get_history_link()@',
3864              );
3865      }
3866  
3867      if( $params['display_actions'] )
3868      { // Display Actions column
3869          $items_Results->cols[] = array(
3870                  'th' => T_('Actions'),
3871                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap',
3872                  'td' => '%item_edit_actions( {Obj} )%',
3873              );
3874      }
3875  }

3878  /**
3879   * Generate global icons depending on seleted tab with item type
3880   */
3881  function item_type_global_icons( $object_Widget )
3882  {
3883      global $current_User, $admin_url, $DB, $Blog;
3884  
3885      if( is_logged_in() && ! empty( $Blog ) && $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_post_statuses', 'edit', false, $Blog->ID ) )
3886      { // We have permission to add a post with at least one status:
3887          $tab_type = ( get_param( 'tab' ) == 'type' ) ? get_param( 'tab_type' ) : '';
3888  
3889          $item_types_SQL = new SQL();
3890          $item_types_SQL->SELECT( 'ityp_ID AS ID, ityp_name AS name, ityp_perm_level AS perm_level,
3891              IF( ityp_ID = "'.$Blog->get_setting( 'default_post_type' ).'", 0, 1 ) AS fix_order' );
3892          $item_types_SQL->FROM( 'T_items__type' );
3893          $item_types_SQL->FROM_add( 'INNER JOIN T_items__type_coll ON itc_ityp_ID = ityp_ID AND itc_coll_ID = '.$Blog->ID );
3894          if( ! empty( $tab_type ) )
3895          { // Get item types only by selected back-office tab
3896              $item_types_SQL->WHERE( 'ityp_backoffice_tab = '.$DB->quote( $tab_type ) );
3897          }
3898          $item_types_SQL->ORDER_BY( 'fix_order, ityp_ID' );
3899          $item_types = $DB->get_results( $item_types_SQL->get() );
3900  
3901          $count_item_types = count( $item_types );
3902          if( $count_item_types > 0 )
3903          {
3904              if( $count_item_types > 1 )
3905              { // Group only if moer than one item type for selected back-office tab
3906                  $icon_group_create_type = 'type_create';
3907                  $icon_group_create_mass = 'mass_create';
3908              }
3909              else
3910              { // No group
3911                  $icon_group_create_type = NULL;
3912                  $icon_group_create_mass = NULL;
3913              }
3914  
3915              $object_Widget->global_icon( T_('Mass edit the current post list...'), 'edit', $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=mass_edit&amp;filter=restore&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID.'&amp;redirect_to='.regenerate_url( 'action', '', '', '&' ), T_('Mass edit'), 3, 4 );
3916  
3917              foreach( $item_types as $item_type )
3918              {
3919                  if( $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_item_type_'.$item_type->perm_level, 'edit', false, $Blog->ID ) )
3920                  { // We have the permission to create posts with this post type:
3921                      $object_Widget->global_icon( T_('Create multiple posts...'), 'new', $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=new_mass&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID.'&amp;item_typ_ID='.$item_type->ID, ' '.sprintf( T_('Mass create "%s"'), $item_type->name ), 3, 4, array( 'class' => 'action_icon btn-default' ), $icon_group_create_mass );
3922                      $object_Widget->global_icon( T_('Write a new post...'), 'new', $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=new&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID.'&amp;item_typ_ID='.$item_type->ID, ' '.$item_type->name, 3, 4, array( 'class' => 'action_icon btn-primary' ), $icon_group_create_type );
3923                  }
3924              }
3925          }
3926      }
3927  }

3957  /**
3958   * Helper functions to display Items results.
3959   * New ( not display helper ) functions must be created above item_results function
3960   */
3961  
3962  /**
3963   * Get a link with task title
3964   *
3965   * @param object Item
3966   * @param boolean Display country flag
3967   * @param boolean Display status banner
3968   * @return string Link
3969   */
3970  function task_title_link( $Item, $display_flag = true, $display_status = false )
3971  {
3972      global $current_User, $admin_url;
3973  
3974      $col = '';
3975      if( $display_status && is_logged_in() )
3976      { // Display status
3977          $col .= $Item->get_format_status( array(
3978                  'template' => '<div class="floatright"><span class="note status_$status$"><span>$status_title$</span></span></div>',
3979              ) );
3980      }
3981  
3982      if( $display_flag )
3983      { // Display country flag
3984          $col .= locale_flag( $Item->locale, 'w16px', 'flag', '', false ).' ';
3985      }
3986  
3987      $Item->get_Blog();
3988  
3989      if( is_admin_page() )
3990      { // Url to item page in backoffice
3991          $item_url = $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$Item->get_blog_ID().'&amp;p='.$Item->ID;
3992      }
3993      else
3994      { // Url to item page in frontoffice
3995          $item_url = $Item->get_permanent_url();
3996      }
3997  
3998      if( $Item->Blog->get_setting( 'allow_comments' ) != 'never' )
3999      { // The current blog can have comments:
4000          $nb_comments = generic_ctp_number( $Item->ID, 'feedback' );
4001          $comments_url = is_admin_page() ? $item_url : url_add_tail( $item_url, '#comments' );
4002          $col .= '<a href="'.$comments_url.'" title="'.sprintf( T_('%d feedbacks'), $nb_comments ).'" class="">';
4003          if( $nb_comments )
4004          {
4005              $col .= get_icon( 'comments' );
4006          }
4007          else
4008          {
4009              $col .= get_icon( 'nocomment' );
4010          }
4011          $col .= '</a> ';
4012      }
4013  
4014      $col .= '<a href="'.$item_url.'" class="" title="'.
4015                                  T_('View this post...').'">'.$Item->dget( 'title' ).'</a></strong>';
4016  
4017      return $col;
4018  }
4019  
4020  /**
4021   * Get item type title with link to change this
4022   *
4023   * @param object Item
4024   * @return string
4025   */
4026  function item_row_type( $Item )
4027  {
4028      $type_edit_url = $Item->get_type_edit_link( 'url' );
4029      $type_title = $Item->get_type_setting( 'name' );
4030  
4031      if( empty( $type_edit_url ) )
4032      { // No perm to edit post type
4033          return $type_title;
4034      }
4035      else
4036      { // Display a link to quick change type
4037          return '<a href="'.$type_edit_url.'&amp;from_tab=type">'.$type_title.'</a>';
4038      }
4039  }

4042  /**
4043   * Get buttons to change item type
4044   *
4045   * @param object Item
4046   * @param integer Index of the row on page
4047   * @return string
4048   */
4049  function item_row_status( $Item, $index )
4050  {
4051      global $current_User, $AdminUI, $Blog, $admin_url;
4052  
4053      if( empty( $Blog ) )
4054      { // global Blog object is not set, e.g. back-office User activity tab
4055          $Item->load_Blog();
4056          $blog_ID = $Item->Blog->ID;
4057      }
4058      else
4059      {
4060          $blog_ID = $Blog->ID;
4061      }
4062  
4063      // Get those statuses which are not allowed for the current User to create posts in this blog
4064      $exclude_statuses = array_merge( get_restricted_statuses( $blog_ID, 'blog_post!', 'create' ), array( 'trash' ) );
4065      // Get allowed visibility statuses
4066      $status_options = get_visibility_statuses( '', $exclude_statuses );
4067  
4068      if( is_logged_in() && $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'edit', false, $Item ) &&
4069          isset( $AdminUI, $AdminUI->skin_name ) && $AdminUI->skin_name == 'bootstrap' )
4070      { // Use dropdown for bootstrap skin and if current user can edit this post
4071          $status_icon_options = get_visibility_statuses( 'icons', $exclude_statuses );
4072          $r = '<div class="btn-group '.( $index > 5 ? 'dropup' : 'dropdown' ).' post_status_dropdown">'
4073                  .'<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-status-'.$Item->status.' dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-expanded="false" id="post_status_dropdown">'
4074                          .'<span>'.$status_options[ $Item->status ].'</span>'
4075                      .' <span class="caret"></span></button>'
4076                  .'<ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu" aria-labelledby="post_status_dropdown">';
4077          foreach( $status_options as $status_key => $status_title )
4078          {
4079              $r .= '<li rel="'.$status_key.'" role="presentation"><a href="'
4080                      .$admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$blog_ID.'&amp;action=update_status&amp;post_ID='.$Item->ID.'&amp;status='.$status_key.'&amp;'.url_crumb( 'item' )
4081                      .'" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1">'.$status_icon_options[ $status_key ].' <span>'.$status_title.'</span></a></li>';
4082          }
4083          $r .= '</ul>'
4084              .'</div>';
4085      }
4086      else
4087      { // Display only status badge when user has no permission to edit this post and for chicago skin
4088          $r = $Item->get_format_status( array(
4089              'template' => '<span class="note status_$status$"><span>$status_title$</span></span>',
4090          ) );
4091      }
4092  
4093      return $r;
4094  }

4096  /**
4097   * Edit Actions:
4098   *
4099   * @param Item
4100   */
4101  function item_edit_actions( $Item )
4102  {
4103      $r = '';
4104  
4105      // Display edit button if current user has the rights:
4106      $r .= $Item->get_edit_link( array(
4107          'before' => ' ',
4108          'after' => ' ',
4109          'text' => get_icon( 'edit' ),
4110          'title' => '#',
4111          'class' => '' ) );
4112  
4113      // Display duplicate button if current user has the rights:
4114      $r .= $Item->get_copy_link( array(
4115          'before' => ' ',
4116          'after' => ' ',
4117          'text' => get_icon( 'copy', 'imgtag', array( 'title' => T_('Duplicate this post...') ) ),
4118          'title' => '#',
4119          'class' => '' ) );
4120  
4121      // Display delete button if current user has the rights:
4122      $r .= $Item->get_delete_link( ' ', ' ', get_icon( 'delete' ), '#', '', false, '#', '#', regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ) );
4123  
4124      return $r;
4125  }

4128  /**
4129   * Display chapters list
4130   *
4131   * @param array Params
4132   */
4133  function manual_display_chapters( $params = array() )
4134  {
4135      global $Blog, $blog, $cat_ID;
4136  
4137      if( empty( $Blog ) && !empty( $blog ) )
4138      { // Set Blog if it still doesn't exist
4139          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
4140          $Blog = & $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog, false );
4141      }
4142  
4143      if( empty( $Blog ) )
4144      { // No Blog, Exit here
4145          return;
4146      }
4147  
4148      $ChapterCache = & get_ChapterCache();
4149  
4150      $chapter_path = array();
4151      if( !empty( $cat_ID ) )
4152      { // A category is opened
4153          $chapter_path = $ChapterCache->get_chapter_path( $Blog->ID, $cat_ID );
4154      }
4155  
4156      $callbacks = array(
4157          'line'   => 'manual_display_chapter_row',
4158          'posts'  => 'manual_display_post_row',
4159      );
4160  
4161      $params = array_merge( array(
4162              'sorted'       => true,
4163              'expand_all'   => false,
4164              'chapter_path' => $chapter_path,
4165          ), $params );
4166  
4167      $ChapterCache->recurse( $callbacks, $Blog->ID, NULL, 0, 0, $params );
4168  }

4171  /**
4172   * Display chapter row
4173   *
4174   * @param object Chapter
4175   * @param integer Level of the category in the recursive tree
4176   * @param boolean TRUE - if category is opened
4177   */
4178  function manual_display_chapter_row( $Chapter, $level, $params = array() )
4179  {
4180      global $line_class, $current_User, $Settings;
4181      global $admin_url;
4182      global $Session;
4183  
4184      $params = array_merge( array(
4185              'is_opened' => false
4186          ), $params );
4187  
4188      $result_fadeout = $Session->get( 'fadeout_array' );
4189  
4190      $line_class = $line_class == 'even' ? 'odd' : 'even';
4191  
4192      $perm_edit = $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_cats', '', false, $Chapter->blog_ID );
4193      $perm_create_item = $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_post_statuses', 'edit', false, $Chapter->blog_ID );
4194  
4195      // Redirect to manual pages after adding/editing chapter
4196      $redirect_page = '&amp;redirect_page=manual';
4197  
4198      $r = '<tr id="cat-'.$Chapter->ID.'" class="'.$line_class.( isset( $result_fadeout ) && in_array( $Chapter->ID, $result_fadeout ) ? ' fadeout-ffff00': '' ).'">';
4199  
4200      $open_url = $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;tab=manual&amp;blog='.$Chapter->blog_ID;
4201      // Name
4202      if( $params['is_opened'] )
4203      { // Chapter is expanded
4204          $cat_icon = get_icon( 'filters_hide' );
4205          if( $parent_Chapter = & $Chapter->get_parent_Chapter() )
4206          {
4207              $open_url .= '&amp;cat_ID='.$parent_Chapter->ID;
4208          }
4209      }
4210      else
4211      { // Chapter is collapsed
4212          $cat_icon = get_icon( 'filters_show' );
4213          $open_url .= '&amp;cat_ID='.$Chapter->ID;
4214      }
4215      $r .= '<td class="firstcol">'
4216                      .'<strong style="padding-left: '.($level).'em;">'
4217                          .'<a href="'.$open_url.'">'.$cat_icon.' '.$Chapter->dget('name').'</a> ';
4218      if( $perm_edit )
4219      { // Current user can edit the chapters of the blog
4220          $edit_url = $admin_url.'?ctrl=chapters&amp;blog='.$Chapter->blog_ID.'&amp;cat_ID='.$Chapter->ID.'&amp;action=edit'.$redirect_page;
4221          $r .= action_icon( T_('Edit...'), 'edit', $edit_url );
4222      }
4223      $r .= '</strong></td>';
4224  
4225      // URL "slug"
4226      $r .= '<td><a href="'.htmlspecialchars($Chapter->get_permanent_url()).'">'.$Chapter->dget('urlname').'</a></td>';
4227  
4228      // Order
4229      $order_attrs = '';// ' style="padding-left:'.( ( $level * 10 ) + 5 ).'px"';
4230      $order_value = T_('Alphabetic');
4231      if( $Chapter->get_parent_subcat_ordering() == 'manual' )
4232      { // Parent chapter ordering is set to manual and not alphabetic
4233          if( $perm_edit )
4234          { // Add availability to edit an order if current user can edit chapters
4235              $order_attrs .= ' id="order-chapter-'.$Chapter->ID.'" title="'.format_to_output( T_('Click to change an order'), 'htmlattr' ).'"';
4236          }
4237          $order_value = $Chapter->dget('order');
4238      }
4239      $r .= '<td'.$order_attrs.'><span style="padding-left:'.$level.'em">'.$order_value.'</span></td>';
4240  
4241      // Actions
4242      $r .= '<td class="lastcol shrinkwrap">';
4243      if( $perm_edit || $perm_create_item )
4244      { // Current user can edit the chapters of the blog or can create item in the blog
4245          if( $perm_edit )
4246          { // Create/Edit chapter, Move to another blog
4247              $r .= action_icon( T_('Edit...'), 'edit', $edit_url );
4248              if( $Settings->get('allow_moving_chapters') )
4249              { // If moving cats between blogs is allowed:
4250                  $r .= action_icon( T_('Move to a different blog...'), 'file_move', $admin_url.'?ctrl=chapters&amp;blog='.$Chapter->blog_ID.'&amp;cat_ID='.$Chapter->ID.'&amp;action=move', T_('Move') );
4251              }
4252              $r .= action_icon( T_('New chapter...'), 'add', $admin_url.'?ctrl=chapters&amp;blog='.$Chapter->blog_ID.'&amp;cat_parent_ID='.$Chapter->ID.'&amp;action=new'.$redirect_page );
4253          }
4254          if( $perm_create_item )
4255          { // Create new item
4256              $redirect_to = '&amp;redirect_to='.urlencode( $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&tab=manual&cat_ID='.$Chapter->ID );
4257              $r .= action_icon( T_('New manual page...'), 'new', $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&action=new&blog='.$Chapter->blog_ID.'&amp;cat='.$Chapter->ID.$redirect_to, NULL, NULL, NULL, array(), array( 'style' => 'width:12px' ) );
4258          }
4259          if( $perm_edit )
4260          { // Delete chapter
4261              $r .= action_icon( T_('Delete chapter...'), 'delete', $admin_url.'?ctrl=chapters&amp;blog='.$Chapter->blog_ID.'&amp;cat_ID='.$Chapter->ID.'&amp;action=delete&amp;'.url_crumb('element').$redirect_page );
4262          }
4263      }
4264      else
4265      {
4266          $r .= '&nbsp;';
4267      }
4268      $r .= '</td>';
4269  
4270      $r .= '</tr>';
4271  
4272      echo $r;
4273  }

4276  /**
4277   * Display item row
4278   *
4279   * @param object Item
4280   * @param integer Level of the category in the recursive tree
4281   * @param array Params
4282   */
4283  function manual_display_post_row( $Item, $level, $params = array() )
4284  {
4285      global $line_class, $current_User, $Settings;
4286      global $admin_url;
4287      global $Session;
4288  
4289      $result_fadeout = $Session->get( 'fadeout_array' );
4290  
4291      $params = array_merge( array(
4292              'title_before' => '',
4293              'title_after'  => '',
4294              'title_field'  => 'urltitle',
4295          ), $params );
4296  
4297      if( $params['chapter_ID'] != $Item->main_cat_ID )
4298      {    // Posts from extracats are displayed with italic:
4299          $params['title_before'] = '<i>';
4300          $params['title_after'] = '</i>';
4301      }
4302  
4303      $line_class = $line_class == 'even' ? 'odd' : 'even';
4304  
4305      $r = '<tr id="item-'.$Item->ID.'" class="'.$line_class.( isset( $result_fadeout ) && in_array( 'item-'.$Item->ID, $result_fadeout ) ? ' fadeout-ffff00': '' ).'">';
4306  
4307      // Title
4308      $edit_url = $Item->ID;
4309      $item_icon = get_icon( 'file_message', 'imgtag', array( 'title' => '' ) );
4310      $item_edit_url = $Item->get_edit_url();
4311      $r .= '<td class="firstcol"><strong style="padding-left: '.($level).'em;">';
4312      if( !empty( $item_edit_url ) )
4313      { // If current user can edit this item
4314          $r .= '<a href="'.$Item->get_edit_url().'" title="'.T_('Edit...').'">';
4315      }
4316      else
4317      {
4318          $r .= '';
4319      }
4320      $r .= $params['title_before']
4321              .$item_icon.' '
4322              .$Item->dget('title')
4323              .$params['title_after'];
4324      $r .= !empty( $item_edit_url ) ? '</a>' : '';
4325      $r .= '</strong></td>';
4326  
4327      // URL "slug"
4328      $edit_url = regenerate_url( 'action,cat_ID', 'cat_ID='.$Item->ID.'&amp;action=edit' );
4329      $r .= '<td>'.$Item->get_title( $params );
4330      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'slugs', 'view', false ) )
4331      { // Display icon to view all slugs of this item if current user has permission
4332          $r .= ' '.action_icon( T_('Edit slugs...'), 'edit', $admin_url.'?ctrl=slugs&amp;slug_item_ID='.$Item->ID );
4333      }
4334      $r .= '</td>';
4335  
4336      // Order
4337      $order_attrs = '';// ' style="padding-left:'.( ( $level * 10 ) + 5 ).'px"';
4338      $order_value = T_('Alphabetic');
4339      if( isset( $params['cat_order'] ) && $params['cat_order'] == 'manual' )
4340      {
4341          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'edit', false, $Item ) )
4342          { // Add availability to edit an order if current user can edit this item
4343              $order_attrs .= ' id="order-item-'.$Item->ID.'" title="'.format_to_output( T_('Click to change an order'), 'htmlattr' ).'"';
4344          }
4345          $order_value = $Item->dget('order');
4346      }
4347      $r .= '<td'.$order_attrs.'><span style="padding-left:'.$level.'em">'.$order_value.'</span></td>';
4348  
4349      // Actions
4350      $r .= '<td class="lastcol shrinkwrap">'.item_edit_actions( $Item ).'</td>';
4351  
4352      $r .= '</tr>';
4353  
4354      echo $r;
4355  }
